characters.description: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets (メダカの人魚の五つ子 Medaka no Ningyo no Itsutsu-go) are five tiny young mermaids who are friends with Keimi. Their names are Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, and Yonka Two.  Yonka has pink hair and a brown-striped tail, her top is brown and her hat is white.  The five sisters tend to talk in a unique speech pattern. Ichika starts off first by saying a regular statement. Nika then states an exclamatory version of Ichika's statement. Sanka then states the opposite of the original statement. Yonka then questions the original statement. Lastly, Yonka Two then questions whether the original statement matters or not. An example of a typical routine:  -Ichika: Luffy is a pirate.  -Nika: Luffy is a pirate!  -Sanka: Luffy isn't a pirate.  -Yonka: Luffy might be a pirate.  -Yonka Two: So what if Luffy's a pirate?   Other than that, they are cheerful and friendly and they usually stay close together.  First Appearance: Chapter 608; Episode 527  (source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Yonka Two
characters.description: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets (メダカの人魚の五つ子 Medaka no Ningyo no Itsutsu-go) are five tiny young mermaids who are friends with Keimi. Their names are Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, and Yonka Two.  Yonka Two has dark brown hair and a yellow-striped tail, her top is black and her hat has jaguar-prints.  The five sisters tend to talk in a unique speech pattern. Ichika starts off first by saying a regular statement. Nika then states an exclamatory version of Ichika's statement. Sanka then states the opposite of the original statement. Yonka then questions the original statement. Lastly, Yonka Two then questions whether the original statement matters or not. An example of a typical routine:  -Ichika: Luffy is a pirate.  -Nika: Luffy is a pirate!  -Sanka: Luffy isn't a pirate.  -Yonka: Luffy might be a pirate.  -Yonka Two: So what if Luffy's a pirate?   Other than that, they are cheerful and friendly and they usually stay close together.  First Appearance: Chapter 608; Episode 527  (source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Mero
characters.description: Mero is a smelt-whiting mermaid and an employee of the Mermaid Cafe.  First Appearance: Chapter 608; Episode 527  (source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Seira
characters.description: Seira is a bluestriped angelfish mermaid and an employee of the Mermaid Cafe.  First Appearance: Chapter 608; Episode 527  (source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Hiramera
characters.description: Hiramera is a olive flounder mermaid and an employee of the Mermaid Cafe.  First Appearance: Chapter 608; Episode 527  (source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Kairen
characters.description: Kairen is a righteye flounder mermaid and an employee of the Mermaid Cafe.   First Appearance: Chapter 608; Episode 527   (Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Royal Nelson
characters.description: "Nelson is extremely obese, to the point where he is unable to walk and must be carried on a humongous chair, by at least six men. This also prevents him from being able to wear a fitted marine coat, which can only cover his arms and back. On his huge stomach, he also has a large tattoo of the Marine emblem in blue. He, aside from his extreme obesity, has some other peculiar marks. He has a long, thin, curved moustache; spiral marks on his huge cheeks and he also seems to have no eyebrows, having two dark spots in their place instead. He also wears a rather expensive looking gold necklace with a red gemstone embedded in it.  On his head, he wears a tall blue marine hat which is also unique in that no similar marine hat was ever seen before or after."  (Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Yuki
characters.description: Yuki was the mysterious little ranch girl who lives on a remote island on a ranch where the giants celebrated. She was responsible for starting a duel between Dorry and Brogy. She appeared in a small flashback at the end of the Little Garden Arc over 100 years ago in 1422 AOS. When Dorry and Brogy caught two huge Sea Kings, she bet them to see which is bigger. This bet became a duel and eventually the reason for their duel was forgotten. It is unknown what happened to Yuki after that but since this event was 102 years ago, it can be presumed that she is now deceased.   First Appearance:	Chapter 129; Episode 78  Source: http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Yuki

characters.name: Monet
characters.description:
__Height:__ 227 cm (7'5")
__Affiliations:__ Donquixote Pirates
__Devil Fruit:__ Yuki Yuki no Mi (Snow-Snow Fruit)
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Logia

Monet is a harpy who poses as a scout and assistant for Caesar Clown and his underlings in the research facility on Punk Hazard. She is revealed to be a deep cover agent sent by Donquixote Doflamingo. Monet appears to have a very flippant personality, choosing to only inform Caesar about the disaster unfolding on Punk Hazard, after finding out that the intruders were the Straw Hat Pirates. Despite all of the uproar, she maintains the thrilled smile on her face, implying she finds it amusing. Monet is also quite diligent, as she explained to Caesar how the Straw Hat Pirates' real strength might be above their current bounties. Monet is also rather sadistic, seemingly enjoying the suffering of others such as chuckling at Law's pain from encountering Vergo. She is also rather flirtatious, such as flirting with Law when he returned to the lab and even thought about a date when he said he needed her. Like many other characters, Monet has a distinct laugh, "Ufufufufu".

characters.name: Papaneel
characters.description: Papaneel is a fishman who lived on Fishman Island at the same time as Otohime.  He was first shown robbing to get money for his family. When Otohime stood in his way, Papaneel tried to shoot her. Otohime dodged his shots and slapped him. After knocking him down, Otohime lectured him about the errors of his ways. Touched by Otohime's concern, he swore to change his ways and rectify his life.  First Appearance: Chapter 621; Episode 540  His name was revealed in One Piece Blue Deep Databook— page 216.  (Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Caesar Clown
characters.description:
__Devil Fruit:__ Gasu Gasu no Mi

Caesar Clown, also referred to as "Master" by his underlings, is a former colleague of Vegapunk and the main antagonist of the Punk Hazard Arc. Caesar is the leading expert on mass-murder weapons and is a mad scientist with a bounty of 300,000,000 beli on his head.  He appears to have a grudge against Vegapunk, as well as a somewhat rational personality, as shown when he hid from the Marines instead of trying to fight them immediately, as well as trusting Monet's deduction that the Straw Hats might be more powerful than their bounties claim and waiting for Joker's approval to make his actions look like accidents, before starting attacks. Caesar is also a rather economizing person, as he didn't want to waste the poison, by clearing it off but rather collected, saved and compressed it into Smiley. It was stated by Smoker that he was one "crazy bastard".  He is a very prideful person, going as far to say that his work four years ago on the mass murdering weapon that caused the Punk Hazard incident was not a failure, but instead was a great success, hinting at a superiority complex. Unlike most Logia users, Caesar keeps his Devil Fruit power activated all the time and is either completely or partly turned into gas.   ~!He also demonstrates tendencies of a superiority complex when Luffy mentioned his Gasu Gasu no Mi had no effect on his immune system due to Magellan's Doku Doku no Mi, both being poisonous Devil Fruits of differentiating class, and Caesar became rapidly aggravated in the fact of Luffy comparing his Logia powers to that of a "mere" paramecia user.!~   ~!He is very ruthless, as he used the blind trust of his injured subordinates to test a newly developed gas and told the Yeti Cool Brothers to kill Brownbeard when he thought he was no use to him anymore. He also used the restricted drug NHC10 to maintain his hold on the children he kidnapped, knowing that they will be unable to escape due to the painful withdrawal symptoms; Law found this aspect of Caesar disgusting. Caesar also seems to like cocktails, as he is often seen holding a cocktail glass.!~  He has a distinct laugh of "Shurororororo".

characters.name: Koala's mother
characters.description: First Appearance: Chapter 623; Episode 543

characters.name: Kinemon
characters.description:
__Height:__ 295 cm (9'8")
__Affiliation:__ Kozuki Family
__Devil Fruit:__ ~!Fuku Fuku no Mi (Garb-Garb Fruit)!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Paramecia!~

Foxfire Kinemon (狐火の錦えもん Kitsune-bi no Kin'emon) is a samurai from Wano Country whom the Straw Hat Pirates found in various pieces at Punk Hazard.   Kinemon seems to follow the code of bushido, claiming he would commit suicide if he could, for the disgrace of being dismembered without dying. He still tried to maintain his pride, even after being completely dismembered. He is also greatly honorable, such as bowing before Sanji (in Nami's body) for saving his torso and thanking him for helping him stating he was indebted to him.  

He is a very old fashioned samurai warrior who expects women to walk three steps behind men and talk gracefully and quietly. He on many occasions referred to Nami as a shameless, violent and obscene woman due to her careless behavior. He has a tendency to be quite perverted in spite of his old fashioned ideals. Though he seemed to be outraged at Nami's sense of fashion, he still greatly enjoyed ogling at her cleavage. He also has an extremely rude special ability of talking with his farts. He cares deeply for his son, Momonosuke, as he traveled to the dangerous Punk Hazard island and challenged one of the Shichibukai to find him. Even after being chopped to pieces, his torso and leg still attempted to look for his son, and attacked anything that got in the way. He seems to be unaware of Devil Fruits, as he said he ate a strange fruit, instead of stating the correct name.   
~!He is the leader of the Nine Red Scabbards, the husband of Tsuru, and a former thug, He is also not the real father of Momonosuke, they pretend to be father and son in order to protect Momonosuke from his enemies, the Donquixote Pirates and the Beasts Pirates. 
Despite the two not being related, the Straw Hat Pirates noted that they looked alike and shared the same perverted traits.!~

characters.name: Vergo
characters.description:
__Debut:__ Chapter 671; Episode 597 
__Height:__ 247 cm (8'1")
__Affiliations:__ Vice Admiral, G-5 (undercover); Donquixote Pirates
__Origin:__ North Blue 

Vergo is a subordinate of Donquixote Doflamingo, Marine Vice Admiral, and head of G-5 who made his first appearance on Punk Hazard. Because of his duplicitous conduct and allegiances he can be considered the secondary antagonist of the Punk Hazard Arc. Through his short discussion with Trafalgar Law, Vergo proved himself to be a shrewd man due to his mistrust of Caesar Clown, having Monet placed on the island to monitor his actions. He can also come across as somewhat condescending, mocking Law's position by pretending to have some respect for the Shichibukai. Seeing himself as above the Shichibukai, Vergo quickly reminds Law of the difference in their power by beating him unconscious. He's also shown to be a person who demands respect from others, such as when he demanded that Law refer to him as Vergo-san. While around citizens, Vergo is said to be an amiable person, much unlike the other G-5 Marines. The parents of the children kept on Punk Hazard trusted Vergo's words that all of the missing children died in an accident. His statement caused them to partly believe that they were truly gone, though some parents still believe that their children are alive. Easily deceiving both citizens and the entire Marines organization, Vergo has proven himself to be highly manipulative. Despite his perceived intelligence however, Vergo can at times seems to lapse into moments of air-headedness such as when he claimed to Caesar Clown that he had been enjoying coffee and cookies, only to be reminded shortly after that there had never been any cookies to begin with.   

Vergo stated that his favorite food is hamburgers. He appears to be a very messy eater, as he was first shown to have the hamburger still on the side of his cheek.

characters.name: Yarisugi
characters.description: Yarisugi is a Marine Commodore of G-5 Unit 06.

characters.name: Harisenbon
characters.description: Harisenbon is a fishman and a member of the New Fishman Pirates. He is the commander of the Sea Urchin Armor Spine Squad.  First Appearance: Chapter 617; Episode 555  (source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Baby 5
characters.description:
She is a servant and assassin of the Donquixote Pirates serving as an officer in the Pica Army. Her real name has not been revealed. Baby 5 is unable to turn down any favors asked of her. She seems delighted at the notion that she is needed whenever she is asked to do something, even when someone explains that she needs to stop granting favors to everyone she meets, she always ends up overwhelmed by the feeling of being needed.
~!That behavior is due to her Having been abandoned by her mother when she was a child, who called her useless before parting and leaving her alone.!~
~!Although they initially fought against each other at Dressrosa, Baby 5 fell in love with Don Sai. In his opposition to her tendency to do whatever is asked of her, he told her to kill herself, which she almost did but he was quick to stop her. Lao G challenged Sai in an attempt to thwart the supposed proposal. Realizing she had spent her life feeling useless, he vowed to make her his wife if he won, much to her joy. He defeated Lao G and Baby 5 conceded, sealing their engagement, becoming a member of the Chinjao Family and consequently becoming a member of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet!~

characters.name: Mocha
characters.description:
__Height:__ 692 cm (22’8½”)

Mocha is a girl who was being held captive in the Biscuits Room, on Punk Hazard.

characters.name: Sind
characters.description: Sind is a boy who was being held captive in the Biscuits Room, on Punk Hazard.  First Appearance: Chapter 657; Episode 582  (Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Biyo
characters.description: Biyo is a boy who was being held captive in the Biscuits Room, on Punk Hazard.  First Appearance: Chapter 660; Episode 583  (Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Ally
characters.description: Ally is a young girl who was being held captive in the Biscuit Room, on Punk Hazard.  First Appearance: Chapter 658; Episode 583  (Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Doran
characters.description: Doran is a boy who was captured and kept in the Biscuits Room on Punk Hazard.  First Appearance: Chapter 657; Episode 583  (Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Uzu
characters.description: Uzu is a child who was held captive in Punk Hazard's Biscuits Room.  First Appearance: Chapter 658; Episode 583  (Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Isshou
characters.description:
__Height:__ 270 cm (8'10")
__Affiliations:__ Marines
__Position:__ Admiral
__Devil Fruit:__ Zushi Zushi no Mi
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Paramecia

Isshou, better known by his alias Fujitora, is an admiral in the Marines. Once the military chief of the former Aoi Kingdom, he was conscripted through a World Military Draft during the two-year timeskip, being appointed to fill one of the Admiral vacancies caused by Kuzan's resignation and Sakazuki's promotion alongside his co-worker Ryokugyu. A proponent of "Moral Justice", he notably spearheaded a campaign to abolish the Seven Warlords of the Sea system. Fujitora was first mentioned by Sakazuki when the latter was first discussing plans to deal with Monkey D. Luffy and Trafalgar Law. His primary goal is to protect people, telling a subordinate that it is more important to take into account the number of lives to protect rather than the number of enemies against them. He takes care to never put innocent civilians in harm's way during conflict and will try to avoid causing collateral damage with his attacks; when he does inflict such damage he makes sure to compensate the owner of the involved property.

In his devil fruit's name, Zushi Zushi is a Japanese onomatopoeia that describes a "thump" or "thud" sound, representing the footfall of something heavy, e.g. stomps of sumo wrestlers.

His blindness is a result of him intentionally inflicting damage on his eyes out of sorrow for all the evil he had seen

characters.name: Violet
characters.description:
Violet is a dancing woman and an assassin of the Donquixote Pirates.
~!She is the younger sister of the late Scarlett, and Rebecca's maternal aunt. She is also King Riku Dold III's second daughter, making her the crown princess of Dressrosa and current heiress to the throne, after Rebecca forfeited her title!~

characters.name: Bartolomeo
characters.description:
__Height__: 220 cm (7'3½")
__Affiliation__: ~!Straw Hat Grand Fleet (current); Barto Club (his own Mafia family) (former)!~
__Position__: ~!Mafia Leader (Barto Club); 2nd Division Commander (Straw Hat Grand Fleet)!~
__Devil Fruit__: ~!Bari Bari no Mi!~
__Devil Fruit Type__: ~!Paramecia!~
__Bounty__: ~!200,000,000 (previously; 150,000,000)!~

Bartolomeo is a Super Rookie and the leader of the Barto Club, his own Mafia family. He was a gladiator competing at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi.

~!After the final battle against Donquixote Doflamingo, Bartolomeo pledged his loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy and became the 2nd division commander of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He has immense respect for the Straw Hat Pirates, especially for Luffy to the point of worshipping him, after witnessing his miraculous survival on the execution stand in Loguetown two years ago.!~

characters.name: Cavendish
characters.description:
__Height__: 213 cm (7'3'')
__Affiliation__: ~!Straw Hat Grand Fleet (current); Bourgeois (former)!~
__Position__: ~!Captain (Beautiful Pirates); 1st Division Commander (Straw Hat Grand Fleet)!~
__Devil Fruit__: None
__Bounty__: ~!330,000,000 (previously; 280,000,000)!~

Cavendish is a Super Rookie and the captain of the Beautiful Pirates. He was a gladiator competing at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi.

~!After the final battle against Donquixote Doflamingo, Cavendish pledged his loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy and became the 1st division commander of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He suffers from a split personality, changing into a bloodthirsty lunatic known as Hakuba when his dominant personality sleeps. He was the prince of the Bourgeois Kingdom before he was exiled.!~

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Rebecca
characters.description:
__Height:__ 171 cm (5'7¼")
__Affiliations:__ Dressrosa; Corrida Colosseum
__Occupations:__ Gladiator 

She was a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum who joined a tournament to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. ~!She is the granddaughter of Riku Dold III, the daughter of Scarlett and Kyros, and the niece of Viola. She is the former crown princess of Dressrosa, who forfeited her title to live with her father and currently serves as a lady-in-waiting to the royal family.!~

characters.name: Chinjao
characters.description:
Chinjao, formerly known as "Don Chinjao" and "Chinjao the Drill", is a former pirate, the leader of the Chinjao Family, and the former 12th leader of the Happo Navy. He also joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He has a bounty of over 500,000,000. Although at first he confronted Luffy for his hatred against Garp, he became his ally during the Dressrosa Arc. 

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Blue Gilly
characters.description:
Blue Gilly is a martial artist from the Longleg Tribe. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.  
~!After the battle with the Donquixote Pirates at Dressrosa, he became part of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet when he joined the XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance, which later converted to a pirate crew called the Ideo Pirates.!~

characters.name: Sugar
characters.description:
Sugar is a special officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Trebol Army. She was one of the most integral components of Doflamingo's plan in keeping Dressrosa in line, as any dissenters were turned into toys by her Hobi Hobi no Mi powers. She is also the younger sister of Monet. Due to her actions and role, she is a supporting antagonist during the Dressrosa Arc.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Rosinante Donquixote
alt_names: ドンキホーテ・ロシナンテ
characters.description:
__Debut:__ Chapter 761; Episode 700 
__Height:__ 293 cm (115.35") 
__Affiliation:__ Donquixote Pirates;~!World Government (former)!~ ~!Marines; Donquixote Pirates (undercover)!~
__Occupation:__ Pirate Elite Officer; ~!World Noble (former)!~ ~!Marine Commander; Pirate Elite Officer (undercover)!~
__Origin:__ Red Line (Mary Geoise) 
__Residence:__  Mary Geoise (former); Spider Miles (former) 
__Devil Fruit:__ Nagi Nagi no Mi (Calm-Calm Fruit)
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Paramecia

Corazón was formerly an Elite Officer of the Donquixote Pirates, and the biological younger brother of Donquixote Doflamingo. ~!This makes Corazón a member of the Donquixote Family and a former World Noble.!~

Corazón was [Trafalgar Law](https://anilist.co/character/13767/Law-Trafalgar) benefactor, being the person who took the boy away from the Donquixote Pirates while attempting to find a cure for his Amber Lead Syndrome. He was able to obtain the Ope Ope no Mi, forcing [Trafalgar Law](https://anilist.co/character/13767/Law-Trafalgar) to eat it and thus giving him the means to save himself from the disease.

When [Trafalgar Law](https://anilist.co/character/13767/Law-Trafalgar) first met with Corazón, Corazón was noted for hating kids, especially when [Baby 5](https://anilist.co/character/75422/Baby-5) and [Buffalo](https://anilist.co/character/247775/Buffalo) played practical jokes on him, such as making him slip upon passing through the doorway or giving him scalding tea that burned his tongue, resulting in his abusive behavior towards them. In fact, the first thing that Rosinante did to [Law](https://anilist.co/character/13767/Law-Trafalgar) was to grab him and throw him out the window. This was actually part of an act, however, as it was his duty as a Marine to dissuade children from joining the crew, which he failed with [Baby 5](https://anilist.co/character/75422/Baby-5), [Buffalo](https://anilist.co/character/247775/Buffalo), [Dellinger](https://anilist.co/character/226059/Dellinger) and [Law](https://anilist.co/character/13767/Law-Trafalgar).

characters.name: Katakuri Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・カタクリ
characters.description:
__Height:__ 509 cm (16'8")
__Devil Fruit:__ ~!Mochi Mochi Fruit!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Special Paramecia!~
__Bounty:__ ~!1,057,000,000!~

Charlotte Katakuri is the second son and third child of the Charlotte Family and the elder triplet brother of Daifuku and Oven. He is also one of the Three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Flour, governing over Komugi Island. 

Due to his actions and role, he is the secondary antagonist in the second half of the Whole Cake Island Arc.

characters.name: Kelly Funk
characters.description:
Affiliation: Mogaro Kingdom
Occupation: Assassin
Devil Fruit: Jake Jake no Mi (Jacket-Jacket Fruit)
Type: Paramecia

An assassin from the Mogaro Kingdom and Bobby Funk's older brother.

characters.name: Kyros
characters.description:
__Height:__ 298 cm (9'9")
__Occupations:__ Gladiator (former), Riku Royal Army Commander (former)
__Affiliations:__ Corrida Colosseum (former), Riku Royal Army

Kyros is a legendary gladiator, who fought at the Corrida Colosseum until 20 years ago. A great bronze statue of him is held at the Corrida Colosseum.

~!When he was turned into a toy, everyone forgot his existence. After his transformation, he became a One-Legged Soldier, known as "Thunder Soldier of Rage". He is the former commander of the Riku Royal Army. He is also the father of Rebecca, husband of Scarlett and the son-in-law of Riku Dold III.

He spent ten years as a toy before being freed by the success of his own Operation SOP. After helping bring down the Donquixote Pirates, Kyros currently lives with Rebecca.!~

characters.name: Karasu
characters.description:
__Height:__ 265 cm (8'8")
__Affiliations:__ Revolutionary Army (North Army)
__Occupations:__ Revolutionary Army Executive; North Army Commander
__Bounty:__ ~!400,000,000!~

characters.name: Belo Betty
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Revolutionary Army (East Army)
__Occupations:__ Revolutionary Army Executive; East Army Commander
__Devil Fruit:__ Kobu Kobu no Mi (Pump-Pump Fruit)
__Type:__ Paramecia

Belo Betty is the commander of the East Army in the Revolutionary Army. Betty treats the people she helps very rudely, insulting them and only referring to them with degrading terms. Despite this attitude, her intention is still to recruit them into the Revolutionary Army by encouraging them to make their own choices. She believes that committing heroic actions is a decision one makes for themselves.

characters.name: Lindbergh
characters.description:
Affiliations: Revolutionary Army (South Army)
Occupations: Revolutionary Army Executive; South Army Commander

Lindbergh, or "Lind" for short, is a cat mink and an executive of the Revolutionary Army, serving as the South Army Commander.

characters.name: Morley
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Revolutionary Army (West Army)
__Occupations:__ Revolutionary Army Executive; West Army Commander
__Devil Fruit:__ Oshi Oshi no Mi
__Bounty:__ 290,000,000

Morley is a giant okama and an executive of the Revolutionary Army, serving as the West Army Commander.

characters.name: Mansherry
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Tontatta Kingdom
__Occupations:__ Princess 
__Devil Fruit:__ Chiyu Chiyu no Mi (Heal-Heal Fruit)
__Type:__ Paramecia

Mansherry is a dwarf and the princess of the Tontatta Kingdom. She is the daughter of Gancho, the king of the Tontatta Kingdom.

characters.name: Leo
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Tontatta Kingdom
~!Tontatta Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet!~
__Devil Fruit:__ Nui Nui Fruit (Stitch-Stitch Fruit)
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Paramecia

Leo is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who is the "Tonta Corps leader”
~!He is the 5th division commander of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.!~

characters.name: Carrot
characters.description:
__Height:__ 161 cm (5'3")
__Residence:__ Zou

Carrot is a rabbit mink in the Warrior Beast Tribe, a member of the Inuarashi Musketeer Squad, and a ruler's aide. She joined the Sanji Retrieval Team to rescue Sanji on Whole Cake Island and continued on with the crew to Wano Country.

characters.name: Pedro
characters.description:
__Height:__ 233 cm (7'7¾")
__Affiliations:__ Mokomo Dukedom; Guardians; Nox Expedition Party\Pirates (former); ~!Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance!~
__Bounty:__ ~!382,000,000!~
__Residence:__ Zou (Whale Forest)

Pedro of the Treetops was a jaguar mink and captain of the Guardians.
He was the former captain of the Nox Pirates who sailed in search of a Poneglyph, and he earned a bounty of 382,000,000 in the process, but his journey was cut short in Totto Land. He accompanied the Sanji Retrieval Team in their quest to rescue Vinsmoke Sanji. ~!During the escape from Whole Cake Island, Pedro sacrificed himself to ensure his team's escape, as he believed the Straw Hats will bring about the Dawn of the World.!~

characters.name: Nekomamushi
characters.description:
__Debut:__ Chapter 809; Episode 756 
__Height:__ 522 cm (17'1")
__Affiliations:__ ~!Mokomo Dukedom; Guardians; Kozuki Family; Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded); Nine Red Scabbards; Roger Pirates (former); Whitebeard Pirates (former)!~ 
__Origin:__ Grand Line (Mokomo Dukedom) 
__Residence:__ Zou (Whale Forest), ~!Wano Country!~

Master Nekomamushi (Cat Viper) is a feline mink and the guardian of the Whale Forest on Zou, dubbed the "Ruler of Night" as he rules over the Mokomo Dukedom from 6:00 PM to 6:00 AM. ~!He and Inuarashi serve as retainers for the Kozuki Family of Wano Country.
Alongside Inuarashi, he was once a member of the Whitebeard Pirates and Roger Pirates, serving under Kozuki Oden. Pedro has claimed that he and Inuarashi must not be allowed to die because "the world is waiting for them".!~

characters.name: Inuarashi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 511 cm 
__Debut:__ Chapter 808; Episode 756 
__Affiliations:__ ~!Mokomo Dukedom, Musketeers, Kozuki Family, Inuarashi Musketeer Squad, Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded), Nine Red Scabbards, Roger Pirates, Whitebeard Pirates!~ 
__Origin:__ Grand Line (Mokomo Dukedom) 
__Residence:__ ~!Zou (former) (Kurau City) Wano Country!~ 

Duke Inuarashi is a canine mink and one of the two rulers of the Mokomo Dukedom, dubbed the "Ruler of Day" as he rules over the Mokomo Dukedom from 6:00 AM to 6:00 PM. ~!He and Nekomamushi serve as retainers for the Kozuki Family of Wano Country.
Alongside Nekomamushi, he was once a member of the Whitebeard Pirates and Roger Pirates, serving under Kozuki Oden. Pedro has claimed he and Nekomamushi must not be allowed to die because "the world is waiting for them".!~

characters.name: Momonosuke Kouzuki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 110 cm (3'7")
__Debut:__ Chapter 684; Episode 609
__Origin:__ ~!Grand Line (Moby Dick)!~
__Age:__ ~!8 (Physically 28)!~
__Residence:__ Wano Country (Kuri)
__Devil Fruit:__ Vegapunk's Artificial Devil Fruit ~!copy of the Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu!~
__Type:__ Artificial Mythical Zoan

Kouzuki Momonosuke is an inhabitant of Wano Country, He ended up on Punk Hazard after stowing away on a ship.
He was first mentioned when Kin'emon told Sanji that he came to Punk Hazard to rescue his "son". His given name was revealed when the samurai was asking if the captive children in the Biscuits Room had seen him

~!He is the son of the late daimyo of Kuri and patriarch of the Kozuki Family, Kouzuki Oden.!~

characters.name: Toki Kouzuki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 190 cm (6'3")
__Devil Fruit:__ ~! Toki Toki no Mi (Time-Time Fruit)!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Paramecia!~

Toki Kouzuki was the wife of the daimyo of Kuri, [Oden Kouzuki](https://anilist.co/character/149797), the mother of [Momonosuke](https://anilist.co/character/126184) and Hiyori ~![(Komurasaki)](https://anilist.co/character/131435)!~, and the matriarch of the Kouzuki Family. She was killed by Kaido 20 years ago.

characters.name: Sukiyaki Kouzuki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 214 cm (7'0")
__Affiliations__: Kouzuki Family
__Occupations__: Swordsmith; Shogun (former)
__Residence__: Wano Country (Flower Capital)

Kouzuki Sukiyaki was the former shogun of Wano Country, the father of the daimyo of Kuri, Kouzuki Oden, and the grandfather of Kouzuki Momonosuke and Kouzuki Hiyori.

Sukiyaki appeared to be a strict and fair ruler, as he was willing to disown and exile his own son, Oden, for his violent actions. Shimotsuki Yasuie believed this was simply a sign of Sukiyaki's tough love for his son and a way to get him to mend his ways. He appeared to be exhausted by and ashamed of his son's ways, calling them demonic. Sukiyaki also seemed to appreciate order, as while he was not bold enough to attempt to establish order in Kuri himself due to how violent it was, he rewarded Oden with the title of daimyo when he brought peace to the lawless region.

characters.name: Jibuemon
characters.description:
Jibuemon is a resident of Kuri and a former retainer of the Kozuki Family. He directly served the former shogun, Kozuki Sukiyaki.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Gorobe
characters.description: Gorobe is a citizen of Okobore Town in the Kuri region of Wano Country.

characters.name: Kyoushirou
characters.description:
"Dozing" Kyoushirou is a money changer in Wano Country's Flower Capital, working for the Kurozumi Family.
~!It's later revealed that he's Denjirou, one of the Nine Red Scabbards, but due to his grief over Oden's execution 20 years ago, Denjirou changed his appearance and went under the name of Kyoushirou. 

With his new identity, he became a yakuza boss and recruited followers to form the Kyoushirou Family. Eventually, he started working for Oden's usurper, shogun Kurozumi Orochi, as his money changer and bodyguard; he would successfully keep his true allegiance to the Kouzuki Family a secret and bide his time until the day would come of the Scabbards reuniting for the final battle to take down Orochi and Kaidou.

Apart from his Kyoushirou identity, Denjiro would disguise himself at night to rob the rich Flower Capital citizens and give to the poor living outside, earning him the moniker "Ushimitsu Kozo". He also took care of Oden's daughter Kouzuki Hiyori for the past 13 years, raising her to become the oiran Komurasaki!~

characters.name: Reiju Vinsmoke
alt_names: ヴィンスモーク・レイジュ
characters.description:
__Height:__ 173 cm (5'8½")

Vinsmoke Reiju also known as "Poison Pink", is the eldest child and only daughter of the Vinsmoke Family. She is a princess of the Germa Kingdom and a commander in its military arm, Germa 66.

characters.name: Yonji Vinsmoke
alt_names: ヴィンスモーク・ヨンジ
characters.description:
__Height:__ 194 cm (6'4½")
__Affiliation:__ Germa 66

Vinsmoke Yonji, also known as "Winch Green", is the fourth son and youngest child of the Vinsmoke Family. He is a prince of the Germa Kingdom and a commander in its military arm, Germa 66.

characters.name: Ichiji Vinsmoke
alt_names: ヴィンスモーク・イチジ
characters.description:
__Height:__ 186 cm (6'1")
__Affiliation:__ Germa 66

Vinsmoke Ichiji, also known as "Sparking Red", is the eldest son and second child of the Vinsmoke Family. He is a prince of the Germa Kingdom and a commander in its military arm, Germa 66.

characters.name: Sora Vinsmoke
alt_names: ヴィンスモーク・ソラ
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Vinsmoke Family; Germa Kingdom

Vinsmoke Sora was the queen of the Germa Kingdom. She was the wife of Vinsmoke Judge, and the mother of Reiju, Ichiji, Niji, and Yonji. She died sometime during their childhood. ~!She is also the mother of Sanji!~

characters.name: Judge Vinsmoke
alt_names: ヴィンスモーク・ジャッジ
characters.description:
__Height:__ 272 cm (8'11")
__Affiliations:__ Vinsmoke Family; Germa Kingdom; Germa 66; MADS (former)
__Occupations:__ King of the Germa Kingdom; Supreme Commander of Germa 66; Scientist; Mercenary
__Origin:__ North Blue (Germa Kingdom)

Vinsmoke Judge, also known as Garuda, is the king of the Germa Kingdom, the supreme commander of the Germa 66, and the patriarch of the Vinsmoke Family. He is also a skilled scientist, and a former research partner to the leading World Government scientist Vegapunk. ~!He is also Sanji's biological father!~

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Niji Vinsmoke
alt_names: ヴィンスモーク・ニジ
characters.description:
__Height:__ 185 cm (6'1")
__Affiliation:__ Germa 66

Vinsmoke Niji, also known as "Dengeki Blue", is the second son and third child of the Vinsmoke Family. He is a prince of the Germa Kingdom and a commander in its military arm, Germa 66.

characters.name: Yomo
characters.description: Pastor Yomo is a sheep mink and one of Inuarashi's Musketeers.

characters.name: Holdem
characters.description:
__Devil Fruit:__ Lion SMILE

Holdem is a headliner of the Beasts Pirates, who resides in Bakura Town.

characters.name: Mouseman
characters.description:
Mouseman is one of the Gifters in the Beasts Pirates. He resides in Bakura Town.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Speed
characters.description:
Speed is a headliner of the Beasts Pirates who is stationed in Bakura Town.
Speed is a tall woman who due to her Devil Fruit resembles a centaur, with the upper body of a human and the lower body of a horse. The right half of her hair is light while the left half is dark, and she has pierced horse ears. She wears a half-light, half-dark jacket with dark shoulder pauldrons and a short light feather cape, and has a saddle on the back of her horse body. Whenever she smiles, her mouth resembles that of a horse.~!However, she is currently subordinate to Tama.!~

characters.name: Batman
characters.description:
__Devil Fruit:__ Komori no SMILE

Batman is one of the Gifters in the Beasts Pirates.

Batman is a hefty man. Due to him eating a bat SMILE, some of his features are bat like, most notably his bat ears, curved fangs, and legs that can transform into bat wings, enabling him to fly while still using his arms (unlike Hildon) for his archery skills. Similar to his fellow Gifters, he wears a horned hood and a dark leather jacket. He has a dark mustache. He also has a quiver on his back.

Like many other people, he has a unique laughter style: "Kikikiki".

characters.name: Kotetsu
characters.description:
Kotetsu was a swordsmith who crafted the cursed O Wazamono grade sword Nidai Kitetsu. He is the ancestor of Tenguyama Hitetsu.

Kotetsu's appearance is unknown. 

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Kamijirou
characters.description:
Kamijirou is a lion's head, legs and tail that are attached to Holdem's body due to his consumption of a lion SMILE.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Tokikake
characters.description:
Tokikake, better known by his alias Chaton, is a Marine vice admiral.

Alias: Chaton (茶豚 Chaton, literally meaning "Brown Pig")

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Tama
characters.description:
__Debut:__ Chapter 911; Episode 893
__Height:__ 108 cm
~!__Devil Fruit:__ Kibi Kibi no Mi (Millet-Millet Fruit) 
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Paramecia!~

O-Tama is a girl from the region of Kuri in Wano Country. She is a kasa weaver and a kunoichi in training who is affiliated with the Kozuki Family.

~!Tama formed a bond with Ace when he visited Wano!~

characters.name: Gion
characters.description:
Gion, better known by her alias Momousagi, is a Marine vice admiral.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Gazelleman
characters.description:
Gazelleman is one of the Gifters in the Beasts Pirates.

Gazelleman is a tall, muscular man with wide shoulders, a large chest, a thick neck, and a square jaw. He wears a skin tight dark shirt with a light colored stylized "G" with the letter's leg resembling a "z", with light colored long sleeves with a dark line through them. He also wears light colored gloves, a Gifter's cape and cowl, and fishnet stockings over his gazelle like legs.

Like many other people, he has a distinct laugh: "Hohohoho".

Devil Fruit: Gazeru no SMILE

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Urashima
characters.description:
Urashima is a yokozuna-ranked sumo wrestler of Wano Country's Flower Capital. He is also of samurai class, thus giving him an elevated social status.

Occupation: Sumo Wrestler

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Kikunojou
alt_names: Zansetsu no Kikunojou (残雪の菊の丞)
characters.description:
Kikunojou is a young woman with long dark hair that falls into her back. She wears sandals and a kimono with chrysanthemum floral patterns. She is a very tall woman, easily towering over Luffy, Zoro, and Tsuru.
~!She is a samurai from Wano Country and a retainer for the Kozuki Family, serving as one of Kozuki Oden's Nine Red Scabbards. She is also the younger sister of [Izo](https://anilist.co/character/35286) and the daughter of the dancing school head of the Hanayanagi School in Ringo. While hiding her true identity, she worked as a tea house poster girl in the region of Kuri. Despite her reputation as a legendary male samurai, Kikunojo describes herself as being "a woman at heart", and thus presents herself in a traditionally feminine manner. She is a very upbeat and friendly person. To friends, she is helpful and nurturing, as seen when she treated Zoro's injuries and tended to Tama when she was being healed of her poisoning.​!~(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Hitetsu Tenguyama
characters.description:
__Height:__ 214 cm (7'0")
__Occupations:__ Swordsmith
__Origin:__ Wano Country
__Residence:__ Wano Country (Amigasa Village)

Tenguyama Hitetsu is a swordsmith, a collector of beautiful girl kokeshi dolls, and the descendant of the legendary swordsmith Kotetsu. He lives with Tama in the ruins of Amigasa Village in the Kuri region of Wano Country.

~!Hitetsu is an extremely caring man, as he took in Tama after the latter became an orphan from losing her parents. He becomes extremely angry when Tama's well-being is put at risk, and is quick to resort to violence against those who he thinks are threatening or taking advantage of her. Hitetsu also took Toko to celebrate the Fire Festival to cheer her up after Yasuie's death, assuring her that her adoptive father will watch over her.!~

~!It is later revealed he is also Kouzuki Sukiyaki!~

characters.name: Komachiyo
characters.description:
Komachiyo is a komainu that resides in the Kuri region of Wano Country.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Minatomo (Wano)
characters.description:
Minatomo is a legendary carpenter in Wano Country and the leader of a guild that Franky joined to get access to the blueprints of Kaido's fortress. He is related to another person, whose name is also Minatomo, who is a descendant of someone who traveled from Wano to East Blue.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Hihimaru
characters.description:
Hihimaru is a baboon that was formerly a guard for the Beasts Pirates before being tamed by Tama.

Epithet: "Raging Baboon of the Mountain" (山の暴れ狒々 Yama no Abare Hihi)

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Nosgarl
characters.description:
Nosgarl is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Kawamatsu
characters.description:
__Occupation:__ Samurai

Kawamatsu once served under Kozuki Oden until Oden was executed 20 years ago. However, Kin'emon believes that Kawamatsu is still alive. ~! Later on found to be alive but imprisoned in Kaidou's labor camp !~

Along with Denjirou and Ashura Douji, Kawamatsu is considered by Kin'emon to have been one of Oden's most powerful followers, being worth 100 men in battle.

characters.name: Shinobu
characters.description:
Shinobu is a veteran kunoichi from Wano Country and an ally of the Kozuki Family. She was formerly Kin'emon's protégé.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Columbus
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Yonta Maria Grand Fleet; Straw Hat Grand Fleet

Columbus is a member of the Yonta Maria Grand Fleet.

Columbus is a short, young-looking girl with long curly hair. She wears a typical sailor's buttoned jacket with a bowtie, a belt that goes across her chest, and light leggings. She also wears dark boots and a vertically striped bicorne hat with a skull on its front.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Shutenmaru
characters.description:
Occupation: Thief, ~!Retainer of the Kozuki Family, Samurai!~

Shutenmaru is the leader of the Atamayama Thieves (頭山盗賊団 Atamayama Touzoku-dan) who reside somewhere in Wano Country
~!Shutenmaru's real name is Ashura Douji, but after Oden's death, he returned to being a criminal under the name Shutenmaru!~

characters.name: Goldberg
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ New Giant Warrior Pirates, Buggy's Delivery (former), Straw Hat Grand Fleet
__Occupations:__ Cook, Pirate, Mercenary (former)
__Residence:__ Elbaf

Goldberg is a giant from Elbaf who is the cook of the New Giant Warrior Pirates and was formerly an S-Class ranked mercenary for Buggy's Delivery.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Imu
characters.description:
__Residence:__ Mary Geoise
__Debut:__ Chapter 906

Imu is an extremely high-ranking individual in the World Government.

Imu has only been seen silhouetted so far. They possess a humanoid figure with a hand resembling a human's and sharp almond eyes with light-colored irises that have thin circles surrounding the pupils. They wear a crown that has four sharp, incredibly tall spikes on the top and an extremely long robe that flows upon the ground a great distance behind them.

~!They are the actual holder of the Empty Throne whom even the Five Elders bow down to. However, Imu's existence is a secret to the rest of the world.!~

The voice actor of Imu was not named, just credited as "???" and their voice distorted to not leak the gender of Imu.

characters.name: Galley
characters.description:
Debut: Romance Dawn, V.1; Romance Dawn Story; Chapter 902
Affiliations: Galley Pirates
Occupations: Pirate
Epithet: "Crescent-Moon Galley" (三日月のギャリー Mikazuki no Gyarī)
Status: Alive
Bounty: 5,000,000 Beli

Crescent-Moon Galley is the captain of the Galley Pirates, and the main antagonist of the very first version of Romance Dawn, which was later animated for Romance Dawn Story. In Chapter 902, he makes a cameo at the Baratie upon the conclusion of the Whole Cake Island Arc.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Road
characters.description:
Road is a giant from Elbaf who is the navigator of the New Giant Warrior Pirates and was formerly an S-Class ranked mercenary for Buggy's Delivery.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Mororon
characters.description:
Debut: Chapter 905
Occupations: Queen of the Tajine Kingdom
Residence Tajine Kingdom
Status: Alive

Mororon is the queen of the Tajine Kingdom.

Mororon is a slender and regal-looking woman whose light hair is gathered into a large mass on the back of her head. She wears a sash around her neck and a form-fitting, spotted, dark kaftan dress.

characters.name: Tacos
characters.description:
__Occupations:__ King of the Shishano Kingdom

Tacos is an older man with a long, oval-shaped face. He has a very large taco-shaped mustache that curves downward, and his hair is gathered into a ponytail. Tacos wears a serape with a detailed pattern on it as well as a sombrero with a small cactus in the center.

characters.name: Komane
characters.description:
Komane is the princess of the Lulusia Kingdom.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Pinkbeard
characters.description:
Pinkbeard is the epithet of the captain of the Pinkbeard Pirates, who are subordinates of the Yonko Blackbeard.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Myukuru Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・ミュークル
characters.description: Myukuru is a daughter of the Charlotte Family and a member of the Big Mom Pirates. She is a Longarm-Human hybrid.

characters.name: Panna Charlotte
characters.description:
Charlotte Panna is the 28th daughter of the Charlotte Family. and a member of the Big Mom Pirates.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Maple Charlotte
characters.description:
Charlotte Maple is the 26th daughter of the Charlotte Family and a member of the Big Mom Pirates.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Yuen Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・ユーエン
characters.description:
Charlotte Yuen is the 35th son and 64th child of the Charlotte Family and a member of the Big Mom Pirates.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Joconde Charlotte
characters.description:
Charlotte Joconde is the 27th daughter of the Charlotte Family and a member of the Big Mom Pirates.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Snack Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・スナック
characters.description:
Charlotte Snack is the 25th son of the Charlotte Family and a member of the Big Mom Pirates. He was one of the crew's Four Sweet Commanders until he lost his position when he was defeated by Urouge sometime in the last two years.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Brownie Charlotte
characters.description:
Charlotte Brownie is the 32nd son of the Charlotte Family and a member of the Big Mom Pirates.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Raideen
characters.description:
Raideen is a giant who resided on Elbaf 63 years ago. He was shown training Hajrudin.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Flampe Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・フランペ
characters.description:
Charlotte Flampe is the 36th daughter and 77th child of the Charlotte Family, a member of the Big Mom Pirates, and Totto Land's Minister of Honey (はちみつ大臣 Hachimitsu Daijin), governing over Rokumitsu Island. She is also the captain of the Katakuri Fan Club and the leader of the Special Forces.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Carmel
characters.description:
Running an orphanage known as the "Sheep's House", her seemingly benevolent nature caused her to be known as the "Holy Mother". Notably, she took care of a young Charlotte Linlin, who would later go on to become the Yonko Big Mom.
~!Mother Carmel was a child trafficker dealing in orphans who operated in the Underworld several decades ago, under the code name "Mountain Witch". In reality, she sold her orphan wards to the World Government every two years to be trained as Marines or Cipher Pol agents, until she met her end 62 years ago.!~

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Lady Tree
characters.description:
Lady Tree is a tree homie living in the Seducing Woods on Whole Cake Island. She's also King Baum's fiancée.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Buche
characters.description:
Buche is a member of the WCI 31 (the group of Whole Cake Island's most renowned head chefs), serving as the head chef of the first kitchen.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Marble Charlotte
characters.description:
Charlotte Marble is the 24th daughter of the Charlotte Family and a member of the Big Mom Pirates. She is a Longarm-Human hybrid.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Jarl
characters.description: Jarl is a giant and former co-captain of the Giant Warrior Pirates, alongside Jorl. Along with Jorl, he is known as a hero of the giants and one of the world's oldest warriors.

characters.name: Bavarois Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・ババロア
characters.description: Charlotte Bavarois is the 26th son of the Charlotte Family, as well as a member of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Jorl
characters.description:
Affiliations: Giant Warrior Pirates; Elbaf
Occupations: Pirate (former); Captain (former)
Residence: Elbaf
Epithet: "Waterfall Beard" Jorl (滝ひげのヨルル Takihige no Yoruru, VIZ: Beardfall)Status: Deceased"Waterfall Beard" Jorl was a giant and former co-captain of the Giant Warrior Pirates, along with Jarl. He was known as a hero of the giants and one of the world's oldest warriors.

characters.name: Gerth
characters.description:
Gerth is a giant from Elbaf who is the doctor of the New Giant Warrior Pirates. She was formerly an S-Class ranked mercenary for Buggy's Delivery.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Prim Charlotte
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__  Big Mom Pirates

Charlotte Prim is the 20th daughter of the Charlotte Family and a member of the Big Mom Pirates, the older twin sister of Praline. She is a hybrid between a human and an octopus mermaid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: King
characters.description:
__Height:__ 613 cm (20'1")
__Affiliations:__ Beasts Pirates
__Devil Fruit:__~!Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Pteranodon!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__~!Ancient Zoan!~
__Bounty:__~!1,390,000,000!~

King the Conflagration is one of the three All-Stars of the Beasts Pirates and [Kaidou's](https://anilist.co/character/46109/Kaidou) right-hand man. He is a member of the nigh-extinct lunarian race from the Red Line, noted for their ability to create fire.

characters.name: Queen
characters.description:
__Height:__ 612 cm (20'1") 
__Debut:__ Chapter 925; Episode 918 
__Affiliations:__ Beasts Pirates; MADS (former) 
__Occupation:__ All-Star 
__Origin:__ Grand Line 
__Residence:__ Wano Country (Onigashima)
__Bounty:__  ~!1,320,000,000 Beli!~
__Devil Fruit:__ ~!Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Brachiosaurus!~
__Type:__ ~!Ancient Zoan!~

Queen the Plague is an All-Star of the Beasts Pirates and one of Kaido's three right-hand men, the Disasters.

characters.name: Suke
characters.description:
Suke is a gangster who is a member of the Kyoshiro Family in Wano Country.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Hyou
characters.description:
Hyo is a prisoner in the Udon region of Wano Country.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Dobon
characters.description:
Dobon is a Headliner of the Beasts Pirates and the deputy warden of the Prisoner Mines in the Udon region of Wano Country.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Komurasaki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 170 cm (5'7")
__Affiliation:__ ~!Kozuki Family!~
__Occupation:__ Oiran
__Origin:__ ~!Grand Line (Moby Dick)!~
__Residence:__ Wano Country (Kuri; Flower Capital)

Komurasaki is an oiran (courtesan) living in Wano Country, having the highest rank of all of them.
~!She is Hiyori Kozuki (日和光月), the daughter of Kouzuki Oden and his wife Toki.

She is Kozuki Momonosuke's younger sister but, with him having been sent into the future, has become older than him.

To hide her identity, Hiyori became known as Komurasaki, working as an oiran of the tayu rank, the highest of all. However, she lost this status after angering Kurozumi Orochi and being presumed to have been killed by Kyoushirou (a disguised Denjiro) in what is later revealed to be staged.!~

characters.name: Kuni
characters.description:
Kuni is a gangster who is a member of the Kyoshiro Family in Wano Country.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Toko
characters.description:
__Height:__ 89 cm (2'11")
__Affiliations:__ ~!Shimotsuki Family!~
__Occupations:__ Kamuro

Toko is a little girl who lives in the Flower Capital of Wano Country and works as a kamuro for the courtesan [Komurasaki](https://anilist.co/character/131435/Komurasaki).

characters.name: Sai
characters.description:
__Affiliation__:~!Straw Hat Grand Fleet (current); Happo Navy (current); Chinjao Family (13th Leader) (current)!~
__Position__: ~!Captain (Happo Navy/Chinjao Family); 3rd Division Commander (Straw Hat Grand Fleet)!~

Sai, also known as Don Sai, is a member of the Chinjao Family.

characters.name: Orochi Kurozumi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 350 cm (11'6")
__Affiliations:__ Wano Country; Kurozumi Family; Beasts Pirates (Ally)
__Occupations:__ Shogun of Wano Country
__Residence:__ Wano Country (Flower Capital)
__Status:__ Alive
__Devil Fruit:__ ~!Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Yamata no Orochi; Snake-Snake Fruit, Model: Eight Headed Serpent ( Snake; Eight-Headed Snake )!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Mythical Zoan!~

Kurozumi Orochi is the current shogun of the Wano Country and an ally of Kaido, one of the Yonko.

characters.name: Bingo
characters.description:
__Debut:__ Chapter 928; Episode 921
__Occupations:__ Priest (former); Cooper (former); Graverobber (former)
__Residence:__ Wano Country (Ebisu Town)

Bingo resident of Wano Country, having lived in the Flower Capital until he was exiled for losing all his money.

characters.name: Pudding Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・プリン
characters.description:
__Height:__ 166 cm (5'5")
~!
__Devil Fruit:__ Memo Memo no Mi (Memo-Memo Fruit)
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Paramecia!~

Charlotte Pudding is the 35th daughter of the Charlotte Family, a member of the Big Mom Pirates and a hybrid between a human and a member of the Three-Eye Tribe. She also works as a chocolatier and the owner of cafe "Caramel" on Cacao Island and was once Sanji's arranged fiancée, per the political agreement between their families.

~!Pudding ate the Memo Memo no Mi, a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows her to manipulate memories. She can reach into a persons head and extract memories in the form of film strips. Thanks to her acting skills, Pudding created a mask of a vicious and cruel person. As part of her mother's plan to assassinate the entire Vinsmoke Family, Pudding deceived Sanji into believing she loved him, taking advantage of his attraction towards her as well as his own vulnerable state of mind.!~

~!As a child, Pudding was abused and ridiculed because of her third eye. Under her mother's rule, she decided to cover her eye with her hair, which escalated to hiding more aspects of herself. Linlin's tyranny made Pudding feel like her mother's puppet, and she was unable to go against her orders, despite internally resenting her. In truth, Pudding is very timid, sensitive, and frightful, which she flawlessly hid with her superior acting skills!~

characters.name: Du  Feld
characters.description: He is a member of the Du Feld Conglomerate and an emperor of the Underworld.

characters.name: Stussy
characters.description: Stussy is an agent of CP-0 working undercover as an emperor of the Underworld.

characters.name: Jack
characters.description:
Jack is a leading member of Beasts Pirates and is one of the three beings called "The Calamaties" under the yonko Kaidou. He is also the commander of his own ship "Mammoth."

Jack is shown to be very ruthless, fearless and has a very violent personality. He refuses to solve any matter through talking and would attack anyone, even his own subordinates, if they were to fail, without mercy. In his own words, he loves destruction.

Jack is man of massive standing and is an Ancient zoan type devil fruit user. He ate the Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth.

Jack has a bounty of 1,000,000,000 Beli.

characters.name: Morgans
characters.description:
__Height:__ 305 cm (10'0")
__Affiliations:__ World Economy News Paper; Underworld
__Devil Fruit:__ Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Albatross
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Zoan

President of the World Economic Journal and one of the emperors of the Underworld. Morgans gets excited by major events, looking forward to reporting them as news to the world. He tends to exclaim "Big News!" when witnessing a newsworthy event. In fact, whenever a big scoop would pop up, he would retain his calm and composure just to get it, despite the chaos and danger the opportunity presents. As the President of the World Economy News Paper, Morgans takes utmost pride in his occupation as a journalist and does not tolerate being called otherwise. He is even willing to risk his life on occasion just to take pictures of a newsworthy event. It is currently unknown what he looks like in his human form.

characters.name: Drug Peclo
characters.description: An emperor of the Underworld. Peclo is not above insulting his fellow Underworld emperors, as shown when he retaliated against Du Feld by insulting him. Like many people, he has a unique laugh: "Gugigigugi!"

characters.name: Umit
characters.description: A shipping magnate and one of the emperors of the Underworld.

characters.name: Giberson
characters.description: A veteran warehouseman and one of the emperors of the Underworld.

characters.name: Cracker Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・クラッカー
Biscuit no Kishi (ビスケットの騎士)
characters.description:
__Height:__ 307cm (10'1")
__Devil Fruit:__ ~! Bisu Bisu no Mi (Bis-Bis Fruit)!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Paramecia!~
__Bounty:__ ~!860,000,000!~

Charlotte Cracker is the tenth son of the Charlotte Family. He serves as Totto Land's Minister of Biscuit, governing Biscuits Island, and is also one of the Three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Smoothie Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・スムージー
characters.description:
__Height:__ 464cm (15'3")
__Devil Fruit:__ ~! Shibo Shibo no Mi (Wring-Wring Fruit)!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Paramecia!~
__Bounty:__ ~!932,000,000!~

Charlotte Smoothie is the 14th daughter of the Charlotte Family and one of the Three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates. She also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Juice. She is a hybrid between a human and a member of the Longleg Tribe.

characters.name: Salome
characters.description: Salome is Boa Hancock’s personal Snake Weapon.

characters.name: Moda
characters.description:
She is a milk maiden that Ace met during his cover story. She is the daughter of Koda and Kyuji.

When Pinkbeard and his crew invaded Lulusia Kingdom, Moda begged him not to steal from them, as the only money they possess goes to the World Nobles as an offering. Pinkbeard struck her down and demanded she hand it over, but Moda was caught by Belo Betty. After Betty bolstered the townspeople using her abilities, Moda used her newfound strength to defeat Pinkbeard

characters.name: Yasuie Shimotsuki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 155 cm (5'1")

Shimotsuki Yasuie lives in Ebisu Town near the capital of Wano Country. He is the adopted father of [Toko](https://anilist.co/character/131437).

characters.name: Señor Pink
characters.description:
__Height:__ 244 cm (8'0")
__Affiliation:__ Donquixote Pirates
__Devil Fruit:__ Sui Sui no Mi (Swim-Swim Fruit)
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Paramecia
__Bounty:__ ~!58,000,000!~

Senor Pink is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army.

~!Senor Pink once had a wife ([Russian](https://anilist.co/character/290147/)) and a son ([Gimlet](https://anilist.co/character/290148/)). Senor Pink lied that he was a banker so his wife would not hate him due to his wife's hatred towards pirates. His relationship with his wife became strained after his son died of a fever and his wife learned that he was not a banker. After his wife got into an accident and was reduced to a vegetative state, Senor Pink dressed like a baby because that was the only thing that made her smile. Even after her alleged death, Pink continues to wear the infant clothes to this day, showing a deep sign of lingering love for her.!~

characters.name: Xebec Rocks
alt_names: ロックス・D・ジーベック
characters.description:
__Position:__ Captain (Rocks Pirates)
__Debut:__ Chapter 957; Episode 958
__Weapons__ was seen wielding a sword during the fight in God Valley

Rocks was the captain of a pirate crew known as the Rocks Pirates, a legendary pirate crew. His goal was to become the king of the world.

~!Rocks was defeated by Roger and Garp on an island known as God Valley.!~

characters.name: Hattori
characters.description: Hattori is Rob Lucci's pet pigeon. Why Hattori is with Lucci is unknown considering the man's reputation, though Lucci has had him since he was a child. He apparently is not afraid of Lucci and is very loyal to him, as he stays close to his master even in dangerous situations

characters.name: Oden Kouzuki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 382 cm (12'6")
__Affiliation:__  ~!Roger Pirates (former); Whitebeard Pirates (former)!~

Kouzuki Oden was the daimyo of Kuri in Wano Country, the disowned son of the former shogun of Wano Country Kozuki Sukiyaki, the husband of Kouzuki Toki, and the father of Kouzuki Momonosuke and Hiyori. 

Notably, he was the leader of nine powerful retainers who were all extremely devoted and loyal to him. ~!Oden was the patriarch of the Kouzuki Family 20 years ago until he was executed by Kurozumi Orochi.!~

~!He was also a division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates and later a member of the Roger Pirates.!~

characters.name: Page One
characters.description:
__Height:__ 171 cm (5'7")
__ Affiliation:__ Beasts Pirates (Tobiroppo)
__Devil Fruit:__ ~!Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Spinosaurus, Dragon-Dragon Fruit, Model: Spinosaurus (Dragon, Spinosaurus)!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Ancient Zoan!~
__Bounty:__ ~!290,000,000!~

Page One is one of the Tobiroppo, the strongest Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates. He is the younger brother of fellow Tobiroppo Ulti. Around peers and superiors, Page One tends to display a rather serious and reserved, if slightly meek, disposition, driven to follow objectives with a single-minded and no-nonsense approach while not rejoining to insults leveled at him by his fellow Tobiroppo. He is usually the first to be exasperated at his sister Ulti's quirky antics, especially so should they devolve into disrespect toward higher authorities, and is flustered by her childish displays of affection for him. He finds his sister's clingy and overly protective behavior towards him irritating, constantly rejecting her demands for affection.

characters.name: Who's-Who
characters.description:
__Height:__ 336 cm (11'0")
__Origin:__ North Blue
__Devil Fruit:__ ~!Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Saber Tiger!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Ancient Zoan!~
__Bounty:__ ~!546,000,000!~

A Lead Performer and one of the Tobi Roppo of the Beasts Pirates. Prior to joining the Beast Pirates, he was the captain of his own crew.

~!it is revealed that 12 years in the past, prior to failing his mission to guard a government ship holding the Gum-Gum Fruit, he was a member of CP9. Who's-Who was said to be an agent of great potential comparable to Rob Lucci. After failing his mission, he was removed from CP9, arrested and imprisoned. During this time, a guard told him about the "Sun God" Nika, a warrior of legend believed in by slaves in ancient times as a savior figure, whom he ought to pray to for salvation. The guard then seemingly vanished from duty. Fearing this information was taboo, he took a risk and escaped from prison, then turned to a life of piracy.!~

characters.name: Bao Huang
characters.description:
Bao Huang is a Headliner in the Beasts Pirates. She appears to have the duty of keeping and presenting daily schedules for the crew and their captain Kaido.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Ulti
characters.description:
__Height:__ 173 cm (5'8")
__Affiliation:__ Beasts Pirates (Tobiroppo)
__Devil Fruit:__ ~!Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Pachycephalosaurus!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Ancient Zoan!~
__Bounty:__ ~!400,000,000!~

Ulti is a Headliner and one of the Tobiroppo of the Beasts Pirates. She is a bold, rude, and short-tempered young woman, not one to back down from a verbal quarrel and regularly threatening violence against those who annoy her. Somewhat fickle, she is shown acting friendly and trying to come off as refined, mature one moment, then yelling whilst dangerously blunt the next.

She is extremely protective of Page One, her younger brother, whom to his annoyance she calls "Pay-tan". Her treatment of Page One is rather volatile, ranging from supportive to demanding, to abrasive and outright violent, usually escalating the more he tries to rebuff her. Overall, Ulti seems more overtly attached to Page One than the other way around, much to his annoyance.

Ulti originally stole both her own and Page One's Devil Fruits from Kaidou to become stronger and thus survive in the crew.

characters.name: Black Maria
characters.description:
__ Height:__ 820 cm (26'11")
__ Affiliation:__ Beasts Pirates (Tobiroppo)
__ Devil Fruit:__ ~!Kumo Kumo no Mi, Model: Rosamygale Grauvogeli (Spider-Spider Fruit, Rosamygale grauvogeli Model)!~
__ Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Ancient Zoan!~
__ Bounty:__ ~!480,000,000!~

Black Maria is a Headliner and one of the Tobiroppo of the Beasts Pirates. Black Maria is a flirtatious, courtesan-like figure who takes a laid-back approach to her missions and duties as one of the Tobiroppo, letting her peers deal with the problems themselves. She also has a soft spot for children. That being said, Black Maria can be just as violent and sadistic as the rest of the Beasts Pirates.

characters.name: Sasaki
characters.description:
__ Height:__ 318 cm (10'5")
__ Affiliation:__ Beasts Pirates (Tobiroppo); Sasaki Pirates (former)
__ Devil Fruit:__ ~!Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Triceratops (Dragon-Dragon Fruit, Triceratops Model)!~
__ Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Ancient Zoan!~
__ Bounty:__ ~!472,000,000!~

Sasaki is a Headliner and one of the Tobiroppo of the Beasts Pirates, and leads the crew's Armored Division. Prior to joining the Beast Pirates, he was the captain of his own crew. Outside of battle, Sasaki is shown to be a rather calm and easygoing man, though not above derision, being shown to scoff at his equal-ranking peers. An ambitious man, Sasaki seeks to become one of the Beasts Pirates' All-Stars by claiming a spot from the current ones, causing him to disregard their senior authority.

characters.name: Gama Pyonnosuke
characters.description:
__Debut:__ Chapter 909, Episode 892
__Residence:__ Wano Country

Gama Pyonnosuke is a toad that sat atop Usopp's head when he was a toad oil salesman.

characters.name: Yamato
characters.description:
__Height:__ 263 cm
__Affiliations:__ ~!Beast Pirates (former)
Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (former)
Wano Country (current)!~

Yamato is the rebellious son of Kaidou of the Four Emperors. 

~!Yamato presents himself after the legendary samurai Kouzuki Oden.
This profound admiration for the legendary samurai has led to the decision to embody everything related to the samurai to the extent of proclaiming to be a man as well, and hence Yamato is widely referred to as Kaidou's son.!~

characters.name: Kanjuurou
characters.description:
__Height:__ 347 cm (11'5")
__Devil Fruit:__ Fude Fude no Mi (Meaning: Brush)
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Paramecia

Kanjuro is a samurai from Wano Country, he was imprisoned at the SMILE factory in Dressrosa under the guise of a toy house. 
~!He is Kouzuki Oden's retainer and one of the Nine Red Scabbards.!~

~!He is also a member of the Kurozumi family. After losing his parents, he was instructed by Kurozumi Orochi to operate undercover within the Kozuki Family, secretly aiding Orochi in his rise to power and efforts to eliminate the Kozuki bloodline, by feeding him information. He acted as an ally to the Straw Hat Pirates in his undercover role in the Dressrosa Arc and Zou Arc, but became an antagonist in the Wano Country Arc after showing his true colors. According to Orochi, due to Kanjuro being raised in the theatre, his main purpose in life is to act as someone else. Due to his parents dying during the persecution of his family, Kanjuro wishes to avenge them and then die.!~

characters.name: Gladius
characters.description:
__Height:__ 260 cm (8'6")
__Affiliations:__ Donquixote Pirates
__Devil Fruit:__ Pamu Pamu no Mi (Pop-Pop Fruit)
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Paramecia
__Bounty:__~!31,000,000!~

Gladius is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Pica Army. Gladius is especially known for his short temper, and his Devil Fruit powers are known to flare up whenever he gets easily enraged. Like most of Doflamingo's underlings, he treats his "young master" with utmost loyalty

characters.name: Perospero Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・ペロスペロー
characters.description:
__Charlotte Perospero__ is the eldest child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Candy, governing over Candy island.

~!Due to his actions and role, he is a major antagonist in the Whole Cake Island Arc.!~

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Oven Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・オーブン
characters.description:
__Height__ : 492 cm (16'2")
__Affiliation__ : ~!Charlotte Family (Big Mom Pirates)!~
__Position__ : Pirate Officer, Minister of Browned Food
__Debut__ : Chapter 861, Episode 827
__Devil Fruit__ : ~!Netsu Netsu no Mi (Heat Heat Fruit)!~
__Devil Fruit Type__ : ~!Paramecia!~
__Bounty__ : ~!300,000,000!~

Oven Charlotte is the fourth son and fifth child of the Charlotte Family, and the younger triplet brother of Katakuri and Daifuku. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Browned Food, governing over Yakigashi Island.

characters.name: Daifuku Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・ダイフク
characters.description:
__Height:__ 489 cm (16'0")
__Devil Fruit:__ ~! Hoya Hoya no Mi (Puff-Puff Fruit)!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Paramecia!~
__Bounty:__ ~!300,000,000!~

Daifuku Charlotte is the third son and fourth child of the Charlotte Family and the middle triplet brother of Katakuri and Oven. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Beans, governing over Poripori Island.

~!Due to his actions and role, he is a major antagonist in the Whole Cake Island Arc.!~

characters.name: Counter Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・カウンター
characters.description: Charlotte Counter is the sixth son and the 11th child of the Charlotte Family and the second quintuplet brother of Opera, Cadenza, Cabaletta, and Gala. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Cadenza Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・カデンツァ
characters.description: Charlotte Cadenza is the seventh son and the twelfth child of the Charlotte Family and the third quintuplet brother of Opera, Counter, Cabaletta, and Gala. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Cabaletta Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・カバレッタ
characters.description: Charlotte Cabaletta is the eighth son and the 13th child of the Charlotte Family and the fourth quintuplet brother of Opera, Counter, Cadenza, and Gala. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Montd'Or Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・モンドール
characters.description:
__Height:__ 260cm (8'6")
__Devil Fruit:__ ~! Buku Buku no Mi (Book-Book Fruit)!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Paramecia!~
__Bounty:__ ~!120,000,000!~

Montd'Or Charlotte is the 19th son and 30th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Cheese, governing over Cheese Island.

~!Due to his actions and role, he is a supporting antagonist during the Whole Cake Island Arc.!~

characters.name: Brulee Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・ブリュレ
characters.description: __Brulee Charlotte__ is the eighth daughter and 19th child of the Charlotte Family and the older twin sister of Broyé. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

characters.name: Galette Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・ガレット
characters.description: __Galette Charlotte__ is the 18th daughter and the 42nd child of the Charlotte Family, an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and the older twin sister of Poire. She also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Butter, governing over Margarine Island.

characters.name: Opera Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・オペラ
characters.description: Opera Charlotte is the fifth son and the tenth child of the Charlotte Family and is the eldest quintuplet brother of Counter, Cadenza, Cabaletta, and Gala. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and served as Totto Land's Minister of Whipped Cream, governing over Noko Island.

characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Roger Pirates

Blumarine was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown. 

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Kurokoma family
__Residence__: Wano Country (Flower Capital)

Kurokoma was a yakuza of the Flower Capital in Wano Country. Forty-one years before the present day, he was the head of his family.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Katsuzou
characters.description:
Katsuzou was a citizen of Wano Country. He died 41 years before the present day, and his cremated body was used by Kozuki Oden to cook a pot of oden.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Isaac Moon Jr.
alt_names: ムーン・アイザック ジュニアー
characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Roger Pirates
__Occupations__: Pirate

Isaac was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Koyama
characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Kouzuki Family
__Residence__: Wano Country

Koyama, as named by Kouzuki Oden and his retainers, is a white boar and the child of the Mountain God that lived in the forests of Wano Country as late as thirty years ago. In what became known as the Mountain God Incident, it was kidnapped from its parent and later stolen by Kin'emon.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Hitsugisukan Koushaku
characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Mokomo Dukedom
__Occupations__: Ruler of Mokomo Dukedom (former)
__Residence__: Zou

Duke Hitsugisukan is a sheep mink and the former ruler of the Mokomo Dukedom before Inuarashi and Nekomamushi.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Roger Pirates

characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Kurozumi Family
__Residence__: Wano Country (Flower Capital)

Kurozumi Higurashi was a member of the Kurozumi Family and a major supporter of Kurozumi Orochi. ~!She was killed by Kaidou for her interruption in his fight with Kouzuki Oden.!~

characters.name: Pine Millet
characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Roger Pirates

Pine was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Kurozumi Family

__Residence__: Wano Country (Flower Capital)

Semimaru was a member of the Kurozumi Family and a major supporter of Kurozumi Orochi.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)
