characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Roger Pirates
__Occupations__: Pirate

Spencer was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Yama no Kami
characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Kouzuki Family
__Residence__: Wano Country

The Mountain God, respectfully called Yama-san by Kouzuki Oden and his retainers, is a giant boar that lived in the forests of Wano Country as late as thirty years ago. In what became known as the Mountain God Incident, it was cut down by Kouzuki Oden during its attack on Flower Capital, but it ultimately survived the ordeal.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Ochoku
characters.description:
Ochoku was a member of the Rocks Pirates.

~!He was the ruler of Hachinosu Island before Blackbeard took over.!~

characters.name: Haccha
characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Beasts Pirates (Numbers)

Haccha is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates.

characters.name: Silver Axe
characters.description:
Silver Axe was a member of the Rocks Pirates.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: John
characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Rocks Pirates
__Occupation__: Pirate

Captain John was a famous pirate captain who was once a member of the infamous Rocks Pirates prior to forming his own crew. He was notable for collecting one of the most significant treasures in the world; his fabled treasure cave and the riches within are notably long sought after by Buggy.

After his death, his corpse was found by Dr. Hogback and modified into one of the General Zombies for Gecko Moria. 

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Charlotte Amande
alt_names: シャーロット・アマンド
characters.description: Charlotte Amande is the 3rd daughter of the Charlotte Family and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Nuts. She is the second child among quadruplets and is a snakeneck-human hybrid.

characters.name: Trebol
characters.description:
__Height:__ 349 cm (11'5")
__Affiliation:__ Donquixote Pirates
__Origin:__ North Blue
__Residence:__ Spider Miles (former)
Dressrosa (former)
__Origin:__ North Blue
__Devil Fruit:__ ~! Beta Beta no Mi (Stick-Stick Fruit)!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Paramecia!~

Trebol is one of the top three officers of the Donquixote Pirates, acting as a Staff superior. He occupies the Club seat of the Donquixote Family, and is the leader of the crew's Trebol Army subdivision.

(Source: One Piece Wikia)

characters.name: Wanda
characters.description: Wanda is a canine mink of the Warrior Beast Tribe, a member of the Inuarashi Musketeer Squad, and a ruler's aide.

characters.name: Raizou
characters.description:
__Height:__ 311 cm (10'2")
__Devil Fruit:__ ~! Maki Maki no Mi (Scroll-Scroll Fruit)!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Paramecia!~

Raizou of the Mist is a ninja from Wano Country, a comrade of Kin'emon and Kanjuro, a retainer of the Kozuki Family, and a former member of the Kouzuki Family Oniwabanshu. He is also a member of the Nine Red Scabbards.

characters.name: Penguin
characters.description: Penguin is a member of the Heart Pirates.

characters.name: Pica
characters.description: Pica is one of the top three officers of the Donquixote Pirates. He occupies the Spade seat of the Donquixote Family and is the leader of the crew's Pica Army subdivision. Due to his actions and role, he is one of the major antagonists in the Dressrosa Arc.

characters.name: Randolph
characters.description: "Crane Rider" Randolph is a rabbit homie and a member of the Big Mom Pirates, having been given a human soul by Big Mom's Devil Fruit power.

characters.name: Ginrummy
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Beasts Pirates

Ginrummy is a member of the Gifters in the Beasts Pirates.

characters.name: Praline Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・プラリネ
characters.description: Charlotte Praline is a half-human and half-hammerhead shark mermaid, the 21st daughter and 47th child of the Charlotte Family. She is married to Aladine of the Sun Pirates.

characters.name: Arrow
characters.description: A member of Tsumegeri Guards

characters.name: Ipponume
characters.description: Ipponume is Ipponmatsu's wife.

characters.name: Brahm
characters.description: A member of Tsumegeri Guards

characters.name: Hyota
characters.description: He is the leader of the Tsumegeri Guards, under Chaka.

characters.name: Barrel
characters.description: A member of Tsumegeri Guards

characters.name: Mashikaku
characters.description: Chief Petty Officer Mashikaku is a subordinate of Smoker and Tashigi. However, it is unknown if he remained with the two after they transferred to G-5 as he is not seen with the G-5 Marines.

characters.name: Shachi
characters.description: Shachi is a member of the Heart Pirates.

characters.name: Tomomi Maruyama
characters.description: Tomomi Maruyama is a photographer.

characters.name: Scopper Gaban
characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Roger Pirates
__Occupations__: Pirate

Scopper was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution.

~!Since the crew's disbandment and Roger's execution, Gaban has come to live out his retirement on Elbaph, alongside his partner Ripley and their son Colon, being known to the giant locals as Ya-san.!~

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Suleiman
characters.description:
__Height:__ 240 cm (7'10½")
__Affiliation:__ Underworld ~!Beautiful Pirates!~

Suleiman the Beheader is a war criminal who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum in Dressrosa to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

characters.name: Sheepshead
characters.description: Sheepshead is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who was in charge of the Gifters on Zou.

characters.name: Tarou
characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Roger Pirates
__Occupations__: Pirate

Taro was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Roger Pirates

Doringo was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

characters.description:
__Affiliations__: Roger Pirates
__Occupations__: Pirate

Yamon was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Mr. 13
alt_names: ミスター・サーティーン
characters.description:
__Debut__: Chapter 105; Episode 63
__Affiliations__: Baroque Works ~!(former)!~
__Occupations__: Assassin ~!(former)!~

Mr. 13 is an otter and a member of the criminal organization Baroque Works, being a part of The Unluckies along with Miss Friday. They were a team that served as messengers for Mr. 0 and were also responsible for executing any Baroque Works agents that fail their missions.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Dellinger
characters.description:
__Height:__ 145 cm (4'9")
__Blood Type:__ S (RH-)
__Affiliations:__ Donquixote Pirates
__Bounty:__ ~!15,000,000!~

Dellinger is a combatant and an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army who is a hybrid between a human and a fighting fish fish-man.

characters.name: Vito
characters.description:
__Height:__ 242 cm (7'11")
__Affiliation:__ Fire Tank Pirates
__Position:__ Advisor
__Bounty:__ ~!95,000,000!~

He is a member of the Fire Tank Pirates, working as the crew's advisor.

~!He debuts as a supporting antagonist during the Zou Arc. Later, along with his crew, he is a temporary ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Whole Cake Island Arc.!~

characters.name: Gotti
characters.description:
__Height:__ 375 cm (12'4")
__Affiliation:__ Fire Tank Pirates
__Position:__ Assassin, Combatant
__Bounty:__ ~!90,000,000!~

He is an assassin, a combatant in the Fire Tank Pirates

~!Along with his crew, he is a temporary ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Whole Cake Island Arc. He later becomes the husband of Charlotte Lola in the "Gang" Bege's Oh My Family Cover Page Serial..!~

characters.name: Pound
characters.description:
__Height:__ 731 cm (24'0")

Pound is Big Mom's 25th ex-husband and the father of Charlotte Chiffon and Charlotte Lola. He is also the grandfather of Capone Pez.

At some point in the past, Pound was abducted by Charlotte Linlin to be her 25th husband. 26 years ago they had two daughters, Chiffon and Lola. After the girls were born, Linlin cast Pound aside.

characters.name: Chiffon Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・シフォン
characters.description:
__Height:__ 215 cm (7'0½")
__Affiliation:__ Fire Tank Pirates; Charlotte Family (defected)

She is the 22nd daughter and the 52nd child of the Charlotte Family and Totto Land's former Minister of Puff and also Capone Bege's wife and the mother of Capone Pez, as well as a member of Bege's Fire Tank Pirates.

Her father is Big Mom's 25th ex-husband, Pound, and her younger twin sister is Lola. Due to her resemblance to Lola, Chiffon was abused by Big Mom in her rage for Lola abandoning an arranged marriage.

characters.name: Big Pan
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Foxy Pirates
__Position:__ Combatant

Big Pan is the largest member of the Foxy Pirates and a combatant of the Groggy Monsters. He is a wotan, a half fish-man (loach fish-man) half giant breed. Due to his actions, he is a major antagonist during the Long Ring Long Land Arc.

characters.name: Diamante
characters.description:
__Height:__ 525 cm (17'3")
__Affiliations:__ Donquixote Pirates
__Position:__ Pirate Executive Officer; Swordsman
__Devil Fruit:__ Hira Hira no Mi (Ripple-Ripple Fruit)
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Paramecia
__Bounty:__ ~!99,000,000!~

Diamante is one of the three top officers of the Donquixote Pirates. He occupies the Diamond seat of the Donquixote Family and is the leader of the crew's Diamante Army subdivision. He is the proprietor of the Corrida Colosseum of Dressrosa, where he earned his title as the "Hero of the Colosseum". Due to his actions and role, he is one of the major antagonists in the Dressrosa Arc.

characters.name: Kyuin
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Donquixote Pirates

She is a member of the Donquixote Pirates, and the boss of the SMILE Factory on Dressrosa.

characters.name: Orlumbus
characters.description:
__Height:__ 480 cm (15'9")
__Affiliations:__ Yonta Maria Grand Fleet; ~!Straw Hat Grand Fleet!~
__Bounty:__ ~!148,000,000 (previously: 98,000,000)!~

Orlumbus is a former adventurer who is the admiral of the Yonta Maria Grand Fleet. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum.

~!After the final battle against Donquixote Doflamingo, Orlumbus pledged his loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy and became a pirate and bacame the captain of the seventh ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is also one of the central characters from The Stories of the Self-Proclaimed Straw Hat Grand Fleet Cover Page Serial.!~

characters.name: Kingbaum
characters.description:
__Height:__ 2340 cm (76'9")
__Affiliations:__ Big Mom Pirates

Kingbaum is a tree homie, a member of the Big Mom Pirates and the master of the Seducing Woods on Whole Cake Island. 

Kingbaum takes his duties very seriously and will ensure that all intruders in the Seducing Woods are killed. He carries some pride with his position, viewing outside assistance as unnecessary and being confident in the abilities of himself and his subordinates.

characters.name: Riku Doldo III
characters.description:
__Height:__ 261 cm (8'6")

Riku Dold III is the former king of Dressrosa before he was dethroned by Donquixote Doflamingo. He entered the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi under the alias of "Ricky". He is the father of the late Scarlett and Viola, and is the grandfather of Rebecca.

characters.name: Zeus
characters.description:
__Height:__ 232 cm (7'7") (as a cloud)
__Affiliations:__ Big Mom Pirates ~!Straw Hat Pirates (Currently)!~

Zeus the Thundercloud is a homie from Big Mom that she summom from her left hand. He is a special kind of homie, as he received a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, serving as one of her personal weapons alongside Prometheus and Napoleon.

~!During the escape from Totto Land, Zeus was captured by the Straw Hat Pirates and forced to become Nami's servant. He lived inside her Sorcery Clima-Tact until he was reclaimed by Big Mom in Wano Country.!~

~!However, Big Mom later abandoned Zeus for good after he struggled during the fighting on Onigashima, replacing him with another homie named Hera. Zeus then went back to Nami's ownership for good, with his soul currently inhabiting her Sorcery Clima-Tact.!~

characters.name: Prometheus
characters.description:
__Height:__ 239 cm (7'10")

Prometheus the Sun is a sun homie that Big Mom summons from her right hand. He is a special kind of homie, as he received a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, and serves as one of her personal weapons alongside Napoleon and Zeus.

characters.name: Kabu
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Tontatta Kingdom ~!Tontatta Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet!~
__Devil Fruit:__ Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Kabutomushi (Bug-Bug Fruit, Model: Rhinoceros beetle)
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Zoan

Kabu is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who is the leader of the Yellow Kabu Squad.
~!
Leo's group, including Kabu, later went with the Straw Hats to Orlumbus' flagship, the Yonta Maria. The dwarves led by Leo was then one of the seven groups that pledged their allegiance to the Straw Hats.!~

characters.name: Bian
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Tontatta Kingdom ~!Tontatta Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet!~
__Devil Fruit:__ Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Suzumebachi (Bug-Bug Fruit, Model: Hornet)
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Zoan

Bian is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who serves as the leader of the Pink Bee Squad. ~!
Sometime after the Straw Hats left Dressrosa, Bian became part of Leo's newly-formed pirate group, the Tontatta Pirates.!~

characters.name: Hack
characters.description:
__Height:__ 280 cm (9'2")

Hack is a Japanese soldierfish Fish-Man and member of the Revolutionary Army. He went to Dressrosa to investigate the arms trafficking there and competed at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi.

characters.name: Ideo
characters.description:
__Height:__ 225 cm (7'5")
__Affiliations:__ Ideo Pirates ~!Straw Hat Grand Fleet!~

Ideo is a XXX rank boxer and member of the Longarm Tribe who is the captain of the Ideo Pirates. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, where he met three other gladiators who he would form the then-XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance. He is confident enough in his abilities to enter the Corrida Colosseum tournament. During the Block C battle royale, he states his one desire: to become stronger, which is the main reason he wants to win the Mera Mera no Mi.   ~!
He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc, whom he eventually pledged his loyalty towards, turning into the captain of the fourth ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.  He's also one of the central characters from The Stories of the Self-Proclaimed Straw Hat Grand Fleet Cover Page Serial. !~

characters.name: Hajrudin
characters.description:
__Height:__ 2200 cm (72'2")
__Affiliations:__ New Giant Warrior Pirates ~!Buggy's Delivery (Former); Straw Hat Grand Fleet!~

Hajrudin is a giant warrior described as the "new generation" from Elbaph. He is the son of the late King Harald, King of War-Land, and the older brother of Prince Loki. 

~!A century after the Giant Warrior Pirates' disbandment, Hajrudin founded the New Giant Warrior Pirates in an attempt to revive the legendary crew; they formerly served as S-class pirate mercenaries for Buggy's Pirate Dispatch Organization. Hajrudin competed as a gladiator in the Corrida Colosseum on Dressrosa for the Mera Mera no Mi, where he would team up with Monkey D. Luffy and the Straw Hat Pirates to overthrow Donquixote Doflamingo's regime. Following this, Hajrudin swore his crew's allegiance to Luffy and became the captain of the sixth ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.!~

characters.name: Machvise
characters.description:
__Height:__ 440 cm (14'5")
__Affiliations:__ Donquixote Pirates
__Devil Fruit:__ Ton Ton no Mi 
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Paramecia
__Bounty:__ ~!11,000,000!~

Machvise is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army. Machvise was born in North Blue. He ate the Ton Ton no Mi at a young age, but many people tried to take the fruit's power by killing him, forcing him to live on the run from frequent pursuers. The pirate Donquixote Doflamingo also took interest in Machvise's Devil Fruit, and after Machvise was unable to escape him, he joined Doflamingo's crew.

Like many One Piece characters, Machvise has a distinct laugh: "Nihihihihihi".

characters.name: Giolla
characters.description:
__Height:__ 221 cm (7'3")
__Affiliations:__ Donquixote Pirates
__Devil Fruit:__ Ato Ato no Mi (Art-Art Fruit)
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Paramecia

Giolla is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Trebol Army. Giolla is quite full of herself and has a habit of mishearing what her adversaries say to her as compliments. She is very passionate about art and her ability to bring her visions to life. However, her passion for the arts seems to somewhat cloud her judgment. She is also very cruel when she wishes to be,

At age 45, Giolla was seen acting as a mother-like figure for younger members of the crew, such as baby Dellinger and little Baby 5 and Buffalo.

characters.name: Nusstorte Charlotte
alt_names: シャーロット・ヌストルテ
characters.description: The 12th son and 21st child of the Charlotte Family and the eldest triplet brother of Basskarte and Dosmarche.

characters.name: Nola
characters.description:
Nola, known to many as the Master of the Sky, is a giant snake who lives on Upper Yard in Skypiea. Having lived for over four centuries, the snake was once the companion of Kalgara and Mont Blanc Noland back when Upper Yard was still part of Jaya. It is the grandchild of the snake Kashigami, whom the Shandia once worshiped as a god. 

Thanks to its large size, Nola is capable of swallowing humans and even buildings as a whole, and can cause large-scale destruction to any structure it makes contact with. Nola can transmit venom through its fangs; the venom is powerful enough to instantly corrode trees.

~!When the snake slammed headfirst into base of the immensely large Giant Jack at high speed after the beanstalk had been slightly weakened by Zoro, the force was strong enough to slightly tilt it. Despite Nola's size, the snake can move very quickly, making it very difficult for its prey to elude it. Nola's scales are extremely tough and durable, as Wyper was unable to damage it even with multiple blasts of his powerful Burn Bazooka. However, a large thunderbolt from Enel proved powerful enough to knock Nola unconscious.
Nola can transmit venom through its fangs; the venom is powerful enough to instantly corrode trees.!~

characters.name: Bonk Punch
characters.description:
Bonk Punch is an officer of the Red Hair Pirates.

In his first appearance in Luffy's childhood, he was considerably slimmer and displayed a different attire, like a striped shirt and a sash.

characters.name: Bakkin
characters.description:
__Height:__ 68 cm (2'3")
__Occupations:__ Pirate (former)

Miss Bakkin is a former pirate, the self-proclaimed lover of Edward Newgate, and the mother of Edward Weevil, a former Warlord of the Sea.

Claiming herself to be Whitebeard's lover, she believes that she and her son have the right to inherit Whitebeard's fortune. She seems to be quite greedy and manipulative, believing that money is what matters in the world, and swaying her son to follow her plans rather than his own for her alleged lover's "fortune". She also finds revenge unnecessary, because there is no money to be gained from it.

characters.name: Ushimaru Shimotsuki
characters.description: Shimotsuki Ushimaru was a member of the Shimotsuki Family, and the last daimyo of Ringo in Wano Country. He ruled until the takeover of Kurozumi Orochi as shogun 20 years ago. He was a direct descendant of the legendary samurai Shimotsuki Ryuma.

characters.name: Monster
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Red Hair Pirates

Monster is an officer of the Red Hair Pirates. He first appeared playing with his crew at the Partys Bar.

characters.name: Hongo
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Red Hair Pirates

Hongo is an officer of the Red Hair Pirates.

characters.name: Building Snake
alt_names: ビルディング・スネイク
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Red Hair Pirates

Building Snake is an officer of the Red Hair Pirates.

characters.name: Limejuice
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Red Hair Pirates

Limejuice is an officer of the Red Hair Pirates.

characters.name: Howling Gab
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Red Hair Pirates

Howling Gab is an officer of the Red Hair Pirates.

characters.name: Aramaki
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Marines
__Occupations:__ Admiral
__Devil Fruit:__ ~!Mori Mori no Mi (Woods-Woods Fruit)!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Logia!~

Ryokugyu is an admiral in the Marines. He was conscripted through a World Military Draft during the two-year timeskip, and was appointed to his rank to fill the two admiral vacancies caused by Aokiji's resignation and Sakazuki's promotion.

~!From what little has been seen so far, Ryokugyu comes off as an extremely laid-back, lazy man not unlike former admiral [Aokiji](https://anilist.co/character/2752/Kuzan). He did not want to make the effort of following [Sakazuki's](https://anilist.co/character/22687/Sakazuki) orders to expel [Fujitora](https://anilist.co/character/82259/Isshou) from Mary Geoise, both out of alleged concern for the damage a fight between them would wreak and because it would be too much trouble for him. More than that, Ryokugyu views even the act of eating itself as too much work, given his apparent ability to survive without food. Also, he appears to have a liking for beautiful women, talking about how he would eat if a "young lady" were to feed him.!~

~!Ryokugyu appears to have eaten a Devil Fruit of an unknown type that enables him to generate various plant life from his body at will and freely control it. The plants he creates can be grown rapidly and moved around freely, seemingly not being limited by any rigidity that some plants, such as trees, normally possess.!~

characters.name: Cosette
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Germa Kingdom
__Occupation:__ Head Chef
__debut:__ Chapter 839; Episode 800

Cosette is the head chef employed in the Germa Kingdom's royal household.

Cosette is very submissive to the Vinsmoke Family, doing anything they order even if it will cause harm to her.

characters.name: Maynard
characters.description:
__Debut:__ Chapter 705; Episode 634
__Affiliation:__ Marines
__Occupation:__ Vice Admiral

Maynard is a vice admiral who appears in the Dressrosa Arc. He was registered as a gladiator to compete at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi, but was defeated before he could participate.

As a Marine, Maynard has a strong sense of justice. He wanted to expose Doflamingo's acts to the world after escaping from the Colosseum. It is unknown whether he believes in absolute justice or moral justice.

characters.name: Sarahebi
characters.description:
__Devil Fruit__: ~!Snake SMILE!~
__Devil Fruit Type__: ~!Artificial Zoan!~

Sarahebi is a Gifter of the Beasts Pirates who works under Black Maria. She is also a school teacher in the Flower Capital.

~!Sarahebi is loyal to her crew, her captain and Kurozumi Orochi as she teaches children propaganda that portrays Kaidou and Orochi as heroes while vilifying Kozuki Oden and the Nine Red Scabbards.!~

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Smiley
characters.description: Smiley, was a pet of Caesar Clown. It was created by gathering and compressing the poisonous H2S gas that spread throughout Punk Hazard and using Vegapunk's process of Zoan devil fruit animation to bring it to life. Smiley, as its other name "Slime" suggests, was an enormous gelatinous red-violet mass that was compared to a mountain in size. Thanks to its Devil Fruit power it took on the shape of an axolotl with eyes, a mouth, legs, caudal fin and external gills.

characters.name: Vegapunk
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Marines 
__Occupation:__ Scientist 

Dr. Vegapunk is the leading scientist in the employment of the Marines. His work includes discovering the secrets and uses of seastone, the secrets of how Devil Fruit powers work, the co-discovery of the Lineage Factor and its applications, and various other scientific achievements that are said to be at least 500 years ahead of current technology. He hails from the technologically advanced Karakuri Island.

~!Before being employed under the World Government, Vegapunk was part of an outlaw scientific research known as MADS, where he worked alongside other notable scientists such as [Caesar Clown](https://anilist.co/character/61603/Caesar-Clown), [Judge Vinsmoke](https://anilist.co/character/127895/Judge-Vinsmoke) and [Queen](https://anilist.co/character/131427/Queen) before being arrested and then integrated into and made the leader of the Marines' science unit SSG (Special Science Group).!~

characters.name: Tensei
characters.description:
__Debut:__ Chapter 1054 
__Affiliations:__ Marines
__Occupations:__ Director of Marine Criminal Investigative Service 

Tensei, also known by his Marine alias Kurouma, is the director of the Marine Criminal Investigative Service.

~!Kurouma met with Fleet Admiral [Sakazuki](https://anilist.co/character/22687/Sakazuki) and Admiral [Kizaru](https://anilist.co/character/21093/Borsalino) to discuss his department's investigation into the Revolutionary Army's invasion of Mary Geoise, the murder of [Nefertari Cobra](https://anilist.co/character/9344/Cobra-Nefertari) and disappearance of [Nefertari Vivi](https://anilist.co/character/726/Vivi-Nefertari), and [Sabo](https://anilist.co/character/32893/Sabo) igniting increased rebellion efforts across the world.!~

characters.name: Lassoo
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Baroque Works~!(former); New Spiders Cafe!~
__Devil Fruit:__ Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Dachshund (Mutt-Mutt Fruit)
__Devil Fruit Type:__ Zoan
Lassoo is [Mr. 4's](https://anilist.co/character/13109/Babe) gun that consumed a Devil Fruit through some unknown method which allows it to become a living dog. He is a sandy-brown gun, similar to a bazooka, that has handles on the sides and a contoured barrel.
Lassoo is always suffering from some kind of cold that makes him have a running nose and sneeze (which makes him fire cannonballs).
He seems to be very loyal to his master, as he did everything he said without question.

(Source: One Piece Wiki)

characters.name: Islewan
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Whitebeard Pirates (former)

Islewan was an early member of the Whitebeard Pirates, before becoming an infamous New World pirate captain of his own crew subordinate to [Whitebeard](https://anilist.co/character/2751/Newgate-Edward). He is a huge man with a face resembling that of a walrus and seems to be very courageous and to have a really strong bond with his crew.

characters.name: Miss Friday
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Baroque Works ~! (former) !~
__Occupations:__ Assassin ~! (former) !~
Miss Friday is a vulture and a member of the criminal organization Baroque Works, being a part of The Unluckies along with [Mr. 13](https://anilist.co/character/225866/Mr-13). They are a team that served as messengers for [Mr. 0](https://anilist.co/character/2749/Crocodile) and are also responsible for executing any Baroque Works agents that fail their missions.

characters.name: Lilith
characters.description: ~!One of the six satellites of [Dr. Vegapunk](https://anilist.co/character/282077), embodying his aspect of "evil".!~

characters.name: Atlas
characters.description: ~!One of the six satellites of [Dr. Vegapunk](https://anilist.co/character/282077), embodying his aspect of "violence".!~

characters.name: Doll
characters.description: Doll is a Marine Vice Admiral and Commander of the G-14 Marine Base.

characters.name: Jaygarcia Saturn Sei
alt_names: ジェイガルシア・サターン聖
characters.description:
__Residence:__ Mary Geoise
__Affiliations:__ Gorosei, World Government
__Debut:__ Chapter 233
__Named:__ Chapter 1073

A member of the Gorosei, the de jure rulers of the World Government.

~!In reality, the Gorosei answer to the world's sovereign: Imu.!~

~!Out of the Gorosei, he has the most lines on introduction. His words are themed around time, with him noting that preventing the awakening of the Hito Hito no Mi Model: Nika was a top priority, because "it is always important to eliminate dangerous variables."!~

~!He showed regret during the Ohara incident, and found Vegapunk's refutation of the World Government's authority to be a matter of shame.!~

characters.name: Stronger
characters.description: Stronger is the horse that Doc Q rides on. Because Doc Q is seemingly always sick, he rides on Stronger all the time, since the doctor tends to collapse if left unsupported for some time. However, Stronger is just as sick as he is.

characters.name: Bastille
characters.description: Bastille is a Vice Admiral in the Marines.

characters.name: Zunesha
characters.description: Zunesha is a Naitamie-Norida elephant that was affiliated with Joy Boy 800 years ago. It now wanders through the New World and carries the island of Zou (home of the Mink Tribe) on its back as punishment for an unspecified crime it committed in the past. Zunesha is comparable to an island in sheer scale; its two-jointed legs are disproportionately and extremely long, such that it can walk on the sea floor while its upper body, including about a third of each leg, remains above the water. Zunesha has comparatively small eyes (shown to have turquoise, ringed irises in the anime) sunken deep into their sockets, being barely visible at most times and giving the impression that it has no eyes at all.

characters.name: Ginny
characters.description:
__Debut:__ Chapter 1095
__Affiliations:__ ~!Revolutionary Army (East Army); Freedom Fighters (former).!~ 
__Occupations:__ ~!East Army Captain of the Revolutionary Army, Slave (former).!~ 
__Residence:__ South Blue (Sorbet Kingdom) 

~!Ginny is a former slave who was forced to take part in the Native Hunting Competition on God Valley 38 years ago.
She and Ivankov are responsible for orchestrating the God Valley Incident 38 years ago as a mean to escape the Native Hunting Competition in God Valley.!~

~!She was the mother of [Jewelry Bonney](https://anilist.co/character/20295/Jewelry-Bonney).!~

~!She was captured by the World Government and became a wife to a World Noble. After contracting the Sapphire Scales disease, Ginny was released from slavery and used the little time remaining to her to return to the Sorbet Kingdom with her child, dying as a result.!~

characters.name: York
characters.description: ~!One of the six satellites of [Dr. Vegapunk](https://anilist.co/character/282077), embodying his aspect of "greed".!~

characters.name: Shaka
characters.description: ~!One of the six satellites of [Dr. Vegapunk](https://anilist.co/character/282077), embodying his aspect of "good".!~

characters.name: Edison
characters.description: ~!One of the six satellites of [Dr. Vegapunk](https://anilist.co/character/282077), embodying his aspect of "thinking".!~

characters.name: Pythagoras
characters.description: ~!One of the six satellites of [Dr. Vegapunk](https://anilist.co/character/282077), embodying his aspect of "wisdom".!~

characters.name: Misery
characters.description: Misery is a homie created by Big Mom as an attack during the Raid on Onigashima. She is formed from the Maser Saber combination of Prometheus, Hera, and Napoleon.

characters.name: Pandora
characters.description: Pandora is a sun homie that was created by Carmel, who placed a portion of her soul into a fire on Elbaf with the power of the Soru Soru no Mi.

characters.name: Hera
characters.description: Hera is a thundercloud homie created by Big Mom at Wano Country as a replacement for Zeus. She is a special kind of homie, having received a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, and serves as one of her personal weapons alongside Prometheus and Napoleon.

characters.name: Napoleon
alt_names: Nikakubou Baikoun no Napoleon (二角帽バイコーンのナポレオン)
characters.description: Napoleon the Bicorne is a homie taking the form of a bicorne hat that is worn by Big Mom. He can also become a sword homie that Big Mom uses in combat. He is a special kind of homie, as he received a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, and serves as one of her personal weapons alongside Prometheus and Hera, and formerly Zeus.

characters.name: S-Snake
characters.description: S-Snake is a Seraphim-clone of [Boa Hancock](https://anilist.co/character/16342/Hancock-Boa) used by the world government as a weapon of justice. She uses the same devil fruit powers as her original counterpart and is a minor antagonist of the Final Saga.

characters.name: Joy Boy
characters.description:
Joy Boy was a man from the Great Kingdom born at the start of the Void Century.

~!Joy Boy ate the Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Nika, a Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allowed him to become an incarnation of the ever-playful sun god, Nika. It gave him a body with the properties of rubber, giving him the freedom to fight however he wanted.!~

characters.name: Guernica
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ CP-0
__Debut:__ Chapter 705, Episode 635

characters.name: Kujaku
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Marines (SWORD)
__Occupations:__ Rear Admiral
__Devil Fruit:__ ~!Muchi Muchi no Mi (Whip-Whip Fruit)!~
__Devil Fruit Type:__ ~!Paramecia!~

Kujaku is a Marine Rear Admiral stationed at Marine Base G-14 and also a member of SWORD. She is the granddaughter of Marine Vice Admiral Tsuru. She is a domineering woman who often employs flirtatious, yet abusive language, not shying away to use it on her fellow Marines or even superiors.

characters.name: Prince Grus
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Marines (SWORD)
__Occupations:__ Rear Admiral
__Devil Fruit:__ ~!Gunyo Gunyo no Mi (Glorp-Glorp Fruit)!~

Prince Grus is a Marine Rear Admiral stationed at Marine base G-14 and a member of SWORD.

characters.name: Hibari
characters.description:
__Affiliations:__ Marines (SWORD)
__Occupations:__ Commander

Hibari is a Marine Commander and a member of SWORD. She is an emotional young woman who is willing to put herself in danger for the sake of an ally. She is kind and considerate towards others, but somewhat bashful and embarrassed over how a boy like Koby may interpret her gestures. She speaks with a Hiroshima dialect.

characters.name: Maha
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ CP-0
__Debut:__ Chapter 929, Episode 922

characters.name: Gismonda
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ CP-0
__Debut:__ Chapter 705, Episode 635

characters.name: Joseph
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ CP-0
__Debut:__ Chapter 705, Episode 635

characters.name: Alice
characters.description: Current secretary of the Galley-La Company in Water 7.

characters.name: Loki
characters.description:
__Debut:__ Chapter 1130
__Occupation:__ Prince
__Origin:__ Grand Line (Elbaph)
__Residence:__ Elbaph
__Bounty:__
~!2,600,000,000!~

Loki is a prince of Elbaph, being the son of King Harald, and the younger brother of Hajrudin.

He was once arranged to marry Charlotte Lola, which would have allied Elbaph with the Big Mom Pirates, until Lola ran away.

~!Known as the "Accursed Prince" and the "Shame of Elbaph", he is currently imprisoned after killing his father in order to obtain an unspecified Devil Fruit. Loki refers to himself as the Sun God, a deity worshiped by Elbaph's populace, and claims he will be the one to "end the world".!~

characters.name: Mishoin Cashible
alt_names: ミショイン・キャシブル
characters.description: Salesman based in Water 7 who rents Bulls to ferry people around the canals.

characters.name: Shamrock Figarland
alt_names: フィガーランド・シャムロック
characters.description: Shamrock Figarland is the commander of the Holy Knights and a World Noble of the Figarland Family, being the son of [Saint Figarland Garling](https://anilist.co/character/354399).

characters.name: Gunko
characters.description:
__Devil Fruit:__ Aro Aro no Mi (Arrow-Arrow Fruit)

Gunko is a member of the Holy Knights.

characters.name: Figarland Garling Sei
alt_names: フィガーランド・ガーリング聖
characters.description: Saint Figarland Garling is one of the Five Elders who publicly head the World Government, holding the title Warrior God of Science and Defense. A World Noble who hails from the Figarland Family, Garling is the father of [Shamrock](https://anilist.co/character/354397/Shamrock-Figarland), a commander of the God's Knights.

characters.name: Marcus Mars Sei
characters.description: Saint Marcus Marsis is a World Noble and one of the Five Elders who publicly head the World Government, holding the title of Warrior God of Environment.

characters.name: Ethanbaron V Nusjurou Sei
alt_names: イーザンバロン・V・ナス寿郎聖
characters.description: Saint Ethanbaron V. Nusjurou is a World Noble and one of the Five Elders who publicly head the World Government, holding the title of Warrior God of Finance.

characters.name: Shepherd Juu Peter Sei
alt_names: シェパード・十・ピーター聖
characters.description: Saint Shepherd Ju Peter is a World Noble and one of the Five Elders who publicly head the World Government, holding the title of Warrior God of Agriculture.

characters.name: Topman Warcury Sei
alt_names: トップマン・ウォーキュリー聖
characters.description: Saint Topman Warcury is a World Noble and one of the Five Elders who publicly head the World Government, holding the title of Warrior God of Justice.

characters.name: Ripley
characters.description:
She is a gain from Elbaph from the last generation of Elbaph warriors. Currently she is a Biology teacher in Walrus Folk School.She is the mother of Collun.
~!It is revealed that she is the wife of Scopper Gaban!~

characters.name: Colon
characters.description:
He is a child from Elbaph. He is known as a delinquent among other children due to his nature. He admires strong pirates like Shanks, the Giant Warrior Pirates, and Luffy. He is the son of Ripley.
~!It is revealed that his father is Scopper Gaban.!~

characters.name: Sommers Sei
characters.description: Saint Sommers of the Shepherd Family is a member of the God's Knights and a World Noble.

characters.name: Killingham Sei
characters.description: Saint Killingham of the Rimoshifu Family is a member of the God's Knights and a World Noble.

characters.name: S-Hawk
characters.description: S-Hawk is one of the Seraphim and a clone of Dracule Mihawk.

characters.name: Onimaru
characters.description:
Onimaru is a komagitsune who was once the companion of the late daimyo of Ringo, Shimotsuki Ushimaru.

After the death of his master, he joined forces with Kawamatsu in collecting weapons for the final battle against Kaidou and protecting them from robbers. After Kawamatsu was captured, Onimaru posed as a human known as Gyukimaru on Oihagi Bridge, stealing weapons from people while continuing to guard the graves.

characters.name: Harald
characters.description: Harald was the most recent king of Elbaph and the father of Hajrudin and Loki, reigning until his alleged murder by the latter 14 years ago.

characters.name: Estrid
characters.description: Estrid was the mother of Loki, as well as the former arranged wife to King Harald, making her Elbaph's latest queen.

characters.name: Ida
characters.description: Ida is a giant hailing from Samuwanai Island in the South Blue who once worked at a circus in the Bunt Kingdom. She was a lover of King Harald of Elbaph, and the mother of his firstborn, Hajrudin.

characters.name: Polo Gram
characters.description: Captain of the Polo Pirates.

characters.name: Anjou
characters.description: Anjou is a pirate admirer who witnessed the execution of [Gold Roger](https://anilist.co/character/4883/Roger-Gold). He has a tattoo of a jolly roger on his right arm.

characters.name: Lili Nefertari
alt_names: ネフェルタリ・リリィ
characters.description: ~!Nefertari D. Lili was the queen of Arabasta Kingdom during the time of the Void Century, being one of the twenty monarchs credited with the foundation of the World Government. Unlike the other nineteen monarchs, Lili chose not to become a World Noble and move to Mary Geoise, but before she could return to her home country, she mysteriously vanished. Aside from that, little is known about her except that she had a younger brother who succeeded her as ruler of Arabasta.!~
